title: Google Keep - Notes and Lists
description:
Quickly capture what‚Äôs on your mind and get a reminder later at the right place or time. Speak a voice memo on the go and have it automatically transcribed. Grab a photo of a poster, receipt or document and easily organize or find it later in search. Google Keep makes it easy to capture a thought or list for yourself, and share it with friends and family.
 
 Capture what‚Äôs on your mind
 ‚Ä¢ Add notes, lists and photos to Google Keep. Pressed for time? Record a voice memo and Keep will transcribe it so you can find it later.
 Share ideas with friends and family
 ‚Ä¢ Easily plan that surprise party by sharing your Keep notes with others and collaborating on them in real time.
 Find what you need, fast
 ‚Ä¢ Color and add labels to code notes to quickly organize and get on with your life. If you need to find something you saved, a simple search will turn it up.
 Always within reach
 ‚Ä¢ Keep works on your phone, tablet, computer and Android wearables. Everything you add syncs across all of your devices so your thoughts are always with you.
 The right note at the right time
 ‚Ä¢ Need to remember to pick up some groceries? Set a location-based reminder to pull up your grocery list right when you get to the store.
 Available everywhere
 ‚Ä¢ Try Google Keep on the web at http://keep.google.com and find it in the Chrome Web Store at http://g.co/keepinchrome.
 
 Permissions Notice
 Camera: This is used to attach images to notes in Keep.
 Contacts: This is used to share notes to contacts.
 Microphone: This is used to attach audio to notes.
 Location: This is used to set and fire location-based reminders.
 Storage: This is used to add attachments from storage to their notes.

comments: This app has potential, but even though I just started using it, I can see where it needs work, 1. Voice recognition is very spotty. No matter how many times I carefully said "get lemons" or "buy lemons," the text results were a joke. So I went to PushBullet and entered my grocery list manually. 2. Every time I created a message, the app produced both a text result (distorted, see above) and an audio recording. I did not want the recordings taking up storage space and spent time deleting every one. Best to give users a choice Text? Voice? Both? before speaking.

I really enjoy using this application but I do wish it had a few more functions such as being able to highlt text in a range of colours. Being able to paste images in different notes. Having a ruler function as well as a pen. So far it's a really great little app but I think these extra things can be added to make it even better :)

1. There should be an option of attaching pdf in the notes that we make. 2. App doesn't work efficiently in landscape mode. (No issues in Portrait mode) 3. There should be an option of using bullets, Italic font, other font types etc (Like in MS office word) 4. Apart from above, there are no issues with this app. Best to use ! Hoping for above mentioned changes in upcoming updates ‚ò∫Ô∏è

I absolutely love this app. Finally a proper notepad for reminders, notes, fast notes handwritten, the notes itself can handle longer text (for fax draft), I can include pictures or web links, and it's connected with my google account so I do everything only one time but it's automatically there on my tablet too. I was looking for something like that for years. I have on my mobile almost only Google apps because they all work great together and perfect between mobile and tablet and it works

Why is there a limit on labels? We really need 'Get Info' in the context menu to view 'Date Created' and/or 'Date Modified'. Let's take it to the next level by associating collaborators with labels, so much easier than adding a contacts in bulk per note. We would benefit from being able to copy the link of the note to share with other services. Also, if possible, could you attempt to add a find/replace feature within a note? Could we have the capability to attach items of various file types?

title: ColorNote Notepad Notes
description:
ColorNote¬Æ is a simple and awesome notepad app. It gives you a quick and simple notepad editing experience when you write notes, memos, e-mails, messages, shopping lists and to-do lists. Taking notes with ColorNote¬Æ Notepad is easier than any other notepad or memo pad app.

* Notice *
- If you cannot find the widget, then please read the FAQ below.
- When you're finished using the notepad, an automatic save command preserves your individual note.

* Product Description *
ColorNote¬Æ features two basic note taking formats, a lined-paper styled text option, and a checklist option. Add as many as you want to your master list, which appears on the app's home screen each time the program opens. This list may be viewed in traditional ascending order, in grid format, or by note color.

- Taking a Note -
Serving as a simple word processing program, the text option allows for as many characters as you're willing to type. Once saved, you can edit, share, set a reminder, or check off or delete the note through your device's menu button. When checking off a text note, the app places a slash through the list's title, and this will be displayed on the main menu.

- Making To-do List or Shopping List -
In the checklist mode, you can add as many items as you'd like and arrange their order with drag buttons activated in the edit mode. After the list is finished and saved, you may check or uncheck each line on your list with a quick tap, which will toggle a line slash. If all items have been checked, then the list's title is slashed as well.


* Features *
- Organize notes by color (color notebook)
- Sticky note memo widget (Put your notes on your home screen)
- Checklist notes for To do list & Shopping list. (Quick and simple list maker)
- Checklist notes to get things done (GTD)
- Organize your schedule by note in calendar
- Write a diary and journal in calendar
- Password Lock note : Protect your notes with passcode
- Secured backup notes to SD storage
- Supports online back up and sync. You can sync notes between phone and tablet.
- Reminder notes on status bar
- List/Grid View
- Search notes
- Notepad supports ColorDict Add-on
- Powerful task reminder : Time Alarm, All day, Repetition.(lunar calendar)
- Quick memo / notes
- Wiki note link : [[Title]]
- Share notes via SMS, e-mail or Twitter

* Online backup and sync cloud service *
- Notes will be encrypted before uploading notes by using the AES standard, which is the same encryption standard used by banks to secure customer data.
- It does not send any of your notes to the server without you signing in.
- Sign-in with Google or Facebook.

* Permissions *
- Internet Access: For online backup & sync notes
- Storage :  For backup notes to the storage of the device
- Prevent phone from sleeping, control vibrator, automatically start at boot: For reminder notes

* FAQ *
Q: How do you put a sticky note widget on the home screen?
A: Go to the home screen and hold down your finger on an empty space and choose widget, Color Note will then be desplayed so you can stick on the page. 

Q: Why don't the widget, the alarm and notes remider functions work?
A: If the app is installed on the SD card, your widget, reminder, etc. will not work properly because Android doesn't support these features when installed on an SD card! If you have already moved the app to an SD card, but want those features, then you have to move the app back on the device and reboot your phone.

Settings - Applications - Manage Applications - Color Note - Move to Device

Q: Where are backed up notes data on the SD card?
A: '/data/colornote' or '/Android/data/com.socialnmobile.dictapps.notepad.color.note/files' on SD card 

Q: I forgot my master password. How can I change it?
A: Menu ‚Üí Settings ‚Üí Master Password ‚Üí Menu Button ‚Üí Clear Password. You will lose your current locked notes when you clear the password!

Q: How can I create todo list note?
A: New - Select checklist note - Put items - Save. Tap an item to strikethrough.

comments: This app is honestly very solid and reliable. If there is one quirk I have, it's that the app's UI seems a little dated. I know it's the big thing to make a modern UI aesthetic, but it's something I think ColorNote would benefit from. ColorNote has a great amount of depth and functionality despite it being a note taking app first and foremost. I think that whoever programmed this app did a great job with it. This app has been a staple on all my Android phones and it syncs your notes as well!

I have used this app in the past but then I switched to Google Keep. But lately I have been getting very frustrated with Google keep and this feels like a breath of fresh air. I hope I stick with this app this time. One suggestion I have is that it would be helpful if there were a way to add widgets to my home screen directly inside the app (rather than leaving the app and pressing the home screen where I actually want to place the widget). Not sure if Android would allow this future.

I estimate that I have used this app since about 2013. I use it daily to jot down things that pop in to my head, to make checklists, to write down information while on the phone instead of using scratch paper which used to get lost, and to write poetry or prose and save it for later. No ads and no links or etc. I love that it is very, VERY simple. It is exactly like getting a piece of paper and then just typing on it and that is all. Saves lists indefinitely and can be backed up.

Very cool. Love it. I don't trust my memory that much, so just drop notes in about anything I want to keep a record of or remember or if I just want to note something down. There is no faffing around, real simple which is what I want for quick note taking and no disruptions. Perfect. Thanks for making it.

I've been using this app for as long as I can remember. Many phones have come and gone, but this app has been with me the whole time. From my phone to my tablet, and PC I've never lost a note. The backup function is especially useful and I've kept a long history of notes. I totally recommend it I don't know what I'd do without it!!

comments: So, it's black. Most of the times. Except when we turn to landscape and it turns into white blackground. Although we can save/retrieve ("backup/restore"?) to web storage, we can't access it from different devices; need to take fast notes on some ideas to a later further development on the tablet? Forget, you can't. I payed for no-ads because when it started to show ads it doesn't seem to work anymore. The bottom line: it could be a very nice app. It could.

Possibly one of the best note apps out there. It gives flexibility in writing, simple to use (‚Äôcause it's notes duh), and an aesthetically pleasing presentation and background. Highly recommend. Been using for a while, really liking it, no MAJOR issues encountered *thus far*.

Perfect white type letters and black background , otherwise I feel like I'm staring at a flashlight , I never have glitches or problems with black note , it's user friendly and quick and I really like I can set type letters from small to larger size , I highly recommend this app black note

Way better on the eyes with that dark screen. I enjoyed it thoroughly you can put your shopping list or you can just quit know if you're watching something on TV and you need the information just type it on in your little blacked note and look at it later. Thanks little blacknote great so far

It has no flaws, nothing to complain about. But I feel that the only 'pop' thing about this app is that it's set in a black colour. If you want me to get more apps of yours then spice it up a bit and give me a reason to live it :)

title: Samsung Notes
description:
With Samsung Notes, 
you can create notes containing texts, images with footnotes, voice recordings, and music. Moreover, you can share your notes easily to SNS.
Previously made any memos from S Note and Memo also can be imported into Samsung Notes.
Samsung Notes provides various brush types and color mixers, so that you can draw fabulous paintings like professional painters.
You may also share your paintings at PEN.UP right away.
Samsung Notes is a hub for all your hand-written notes, sketches, drawings.


Creating notes
Tap + icon at the bottom of the main screen of Samsung Notes to create notes.

Locking notes
1.Tap the More options button on the main screen of Samsung Notes, select Settings, 
  then select Lock notes to create a password.
2.Create a password, then tap the note you want to lock.
3.Tap the More options button while viewing a note, then select Lock.

Adding text
Tap keyboard icon at the top of the screen to enter text using the keyboard. 
Use the Rich text toolbar to edit the style of the text.

Adding handwriting
Tap Handwriting icon at the top of the screen to add handwriting. 
Handwritten text can be recognised. You can also use handwriting to search for keywords in notes.

Adding drawings
Tap drawing icon at the top of the screen to create drawings.

Adding image and voice recordings
Tap image icon at the top of the screen to insert images. 
Tap Voice recording icon at the top of the screen to insert voice recordings.

Using pen settings
Select from various pen types, sizes, and colours.

Erasing handwriting
Tap eraser icon at the bottom of the screen, then tap or swipe your finger over the handwriting you want to erase.

Using Selection mode
Tap selection icon at the bottom of the screen, then select an area of handwriting. 
You can then move the selected area, adjust its size, and more.

Using brush settings
Select from various brush types and colours. 
Tap the selected brush to view the brush settings again and change more settings such as the size and opacity.
Tap color icon, then select the colour you want to draw with.

Using Smart Switch.
Use Smart Switch to import S Note and Memo data from other devices.

Using Samsung account.
1.Tap the More options button while on the main screen of Samsung Notes, select Settings, then select Import data.
2.Select S Note or Memo data saved using your Samsung account, then tap the DONE button.

Syncing notes via Samsung Cloud
1.Tap the More options button while on the main screen of Samsung Notes, select Settings, 
  then select Sync with Samsung Cloud.
2.Register with or sign in to Samsung Cloud using your Samsung account. 
  Samsung Notes data will be synced automatically.

Creating notes while screen off
Detach the S Pen while the screen is turned off to create screen off memos.

Keyword : SDOC, Note, Memo

--------------------------------------------------------

Notice : Regarding the App Access Privilege
The following permissions are required for the app service. 
For optional permissions, the default functionality of the service is turned on, but not allowed.

Required permissions
‚Ä¢ Storage: Used to save or load note files

Optional permissions
‚Ä¢ Telephone: Used to check device-unique identification information for providing app update
‚Ä¢ Microphone: Used to record the voice to be inserted into the note
‚Ä¢ Camera: Used to take photos to be inserted into the note
‚Ä¢ Location: Used to provide location information when opening web links requesting location
‚Ä¢ Contacts: Used to read account information to sync with your account

comments: I love this app. But as many noticed with the last update (early March 2020), all my old notes showed on the main screen but were blank when I tried to open each one. I updated all my apps hoping it was the problem. Didnt work. So I went into this app specifically and updated it alone. Now its back to normal and I can open up all my old notes!

I use this for alot of things, including my shopping list. As you delete items from your list and try to bring the next item back, it doesn't, so you have a huge gap between rows and/or items. Whatever I had on my Samsung Galaxy 6 was better!!! It allowed you to back space/delete everything while holding down on the backspace or "x" key. The app on the Galacy 8 doesn't. You can only delete one row at a time, like I stated above.

The March 2020 update clearly was quirky and you couldn't open the notes. I have been using this app for years and transferred notes between phones when I've upgraded and this has never happened. It really scared me to think all the data I've lost. But I followed the advice of another user below - update the app separately and I now everything is full restored and I have access to all of my notes. It would have been helpful if Samsung provided this info versus trial an error by the users.

A great app , however badly managed ESPECIALLY directly after a system upgrade. Opened app for info required and no data available. Warning appeared showing ' app crash ' - ongoing until I accessed app on Google Play Store and updated ( system update just done ??? ). A critical app and more focus required from Samsung/Developer.

I had a ton of notes on here...and was pleased with it. Then one day I tried to open my notes and all i would get was a blank page. I tried rebooting my phone and checking settings. Finally I hit edit on each note before opening, shared it to my email and emailed to myself. I am now deleting it and going with something else. With all these negative reviews you would think they would do something to fix it.

title: Microsoft OneNote: Save Ideas and Organize Notes
description:
Organize your thoughts, discoveries, and ideas and simplify planning important moments in your life with your digital notepad. Microsoft OneNote lets you take notes on your phone and sync them across all your devices.

With OneNote, you can plan a big event, seize a moment of inspiration to create something new, and track your list of errands that are too important to forget. Take notes, write memos and make a digital sketchbook right on your phone. Capture pictures and add images to your notes.

Sync notes across your devices to access them anytime, anywhere. Save ideas and check your list at home, in the office, or on the go across your devices. Search your notes quickly and effortlessly.

Take notes, share ideas, organize and collaborate when you download Microsoft OneNote today. 

Capture Content And Get Organized
‚Ä¢ Write notes, draw and clip things from the web to get your thoughts down into your notebook.
‚Ä¢ Use OneNote‚Äôs flexible canvas to place content anywhere you want.
‚Ä¢ Scan documents and business cards straight into OneNote.
‚Ä¢ Save pictures and images to your notes.

Take Notes And Achieve More
‚Ä¢ OneNote is a digital notebook that brings 3-ring binders to the digital era. 
‚Ä¢ Organize notes with sections and pages to separate thoughts by theme at school, home or work.
‚Ä¢ Organize your notes using to-do lists, follow up items, marks for what‚Äôs important and custom labels.
‚Ä¢ Use OneNote as a notebook, journal or a notepad.

Save Ideas At The Speed of Light
‚Ä¢ OneNote syncs your notes across all devices and lets multiple people work on the content together, at the same time.
‚Ä¢ Use the notepad to list your thoughts down whenever something crosses your mind.
‚Ä¢ Notepad badge hovers on screen and lets you quickly write your thoughts down any time.
‚Ä¢ Sticky notes are helpful for quick memos.

Collaborate and Share Notes
‚Ä¢ Take meeting notes, brainstorm projects, draw attention to important points and organize key resources.
‚Ä¢ Collaborate in real time to stay in sync and on the same page.
‚Ä¢ Take notes and save ideas across your favorite devices, no matter what device your team likes to use.
‚Ä¢ Take notes during classes or meetings, mixing in text, voice, ink and web clippings.
‚Ä¢ Search your notes with a fast and powerful search function

Better Together With Microsoft Office
‚Ä¢ OneNote is part of the Office family and works great with your favorite apps, such as Excel or Word, to help you do more.

Write notes, save ideas and keep up with your to-do list with Microsoft OneNote.

You can find answers to frequently asked questions about OneNote for Android at http://aka.ms/OnenoteAndroidFAQ

Requirements:
‚Ä¢ Requires Android OS 5.0 or later.
‚Ä¢ A free Microsoft account is required to use OneNote.
‚Ä¢ OneNote opens existing notebooks created in Microsoft OneNote 2010 format or later.
‚Ä¢ To sync your notes to OneDrive for Business, sign in with your organization‚Äôs Office 365 or SharePoint account.

This app is provided either by Microsoft or a third-party app publisher and is subject to a separate privacy statement and terms and conditions. Data provided through the use of this store and this app may be accessible to Microsoft or the third-party app publisher, as applicable, and transferred to, stored and processed in the United States or any other country where Microsoft or the app publisher and their affiliates or service providers maintain facilities.

Please refer to Microsoft‚Äôs End User License Agreement (EULA) for Terms of Service for OneNote on Android. By installing the app, you agree to these terms and conditions: https://support.office.com/legal?llcc=en-us&aid=OneNoteForAndroidLicenseTerms.htm. Microsoft‚Äôs privacy statement is available at https://privacy.microsoft.com/en-us/privacystatement

comments: Looks like Microsoft doesn't have time to look after the bugs. Very bad experience of this app. It hangs quotes often asking there are many features requested by users worldwide and looks like Microsoft is very busy. Moving to Notion today. At least Microsoft should have done features which makes migration easy. It's like, once you are addicted to their product, you can not escape.

It works well. But of course I have had on hiccup when using it over the past year and that was easily fixed by just reinstalling the app. Its great for those who like sharing content between their different devices, and has potential to also be a learning tool for schools (like a cloud based classroom where material can be put up and then answers uploaded into folders by the student).

The app itself is good, but it is no-where close to the desktop version. That version is more feature-packed, more customizable, and just overall a better experience than this app. Microsoft, if you see this review, please update this app. I really would like to use OneNote as my primary way of taking college notes. Also, please stop showing the "recent pages" page when I start the all. I prefer going directly to my most recent notebook compared to the actual recents page.

I've been using it for long now. Lately it began to be a pain in the... Eny time I switch apps and come back to OneNote, it is stuck fozen and you have to kill the process and the restart OneNote again to paste something or type something. But then you switch to other app again (for instance, reading some book), find a spot you need to keep, copy piece from there, come to OneNote - it's stuck frozen again, you have to kil and restart the app... What's a heck!? Microsoft, this one used to work! Revert to the working version and stop destroying the app calling it "improvement"! I realy start to wonder if I should stop my Office subscription!

I like it cause this is the most practical handwriting note inter-devices and can be access through all medium, web and phone. My only problem is the shifting. I'm using a Samsung Tablet and every time I handwrite there will be a slight left shift of the words which is very frustrating especially when I want to write using Chinese characters which means stroke order is very important and a shift will ruin the stroke order. I also wish there is a way to turn off the pressure sensitivity for S Pen

title: Notes
description:
Notes is the easiest way to keep track of your thoughts and ideas. It's fast, free and lightweight while offering a lot of useful notepad features like text formatting, pictures, and colors. Organize your notes into notebooks, secure them with a password or synchronize them to all your devices - it's up to you. Notes supports it.
 
Stay organized
‚Ä¢ Use notebooks (or even nested notebooks) to organize your notes together
‚Ä¢ Easily find what you've once written by using the search functionality
‚Ä¢ Optionally enable Dropbox or Google Drive synchronization and your notes will always be within reach on all your Android devices and online at http://www.notesforweb.com

Customize your notes
‚Ä¢ Make text bold, italic or strike-through using the WYSIWYG editor
‚Ä¢ Add pictures to your notes and easily move them around
‚Ä¢ Set color to a note to make it stand out from the rest
‚Ä¢ Create checklists to create to-do lists

Password protection
‚Ä¢ Keep your notes private by setting up a password. You can choose to use a text password or a PIN code, depending on your level of security.
‚Ä¢ Choose whether the entire app is locked or only specific notebooks
 
Clean user interface
‚Ä¢ A beautiful design that is optimized for phones and tablets helps you stay focused on your notes
‚Ä¢ One tap on a note is all it takes to start editing it
‚Ä¢ Save battery by using the dark/night mode

This app is internationally known as "Notes" and available in English, French, German, Italian, Spanish, Dutch, Russian, Ukrainian, Czech and Indonesian. Feel free to contact me if you have any questions or feedback. If you like Notes, please rate it.

title: Notepad Free
description:
Notepad Free is a small and fast app to create and edit text notes. Features:
* simple interface that most of the users find easy to use
* no limits on note's length or number of notes (of course there's a limit to phone's storage)
* creating and editing text notes
* sharing notes with other apps (e.g. sending a note in Gmail)
* widgets allowing to quickly create or edit notes
* backup function for saving and loading notes from a backup file (zip file)

** Important **
Please remember to make a backup copy of notes before formatting a phone or buying a new phone. Since the 1.7.0 version the app will also use Google device copy, if it's turned on in the device's and the app's settings.

* Why do I advise to not install the app on an SD card?
I follow Google's advice to block installing on an SD card apps that use widgets. This app uses widgets, which are like icons for the notes, and can be placed on a phone's home screen (for example).

* Why is the permission for writing on SD card listed on the permissions list?
It's optional, and it's needed for the backup function. The backup functions creates a backup copy of all notes and saves it to a file. This file can be saved anywhere, so the app must get the permission for even listing possible target folder.
Please remember that the permission can be revoked at any moment by going into the app's settings. Also, the app will ask for the permission when needed.

If you have any additional questions, just contact me by email: notepad.free@outlook.com .

Thank you.
Arek

Terrible experience with thos app, if you write a lengthy title the date covers it up, if you scroll it has the chance to highlight some of your notes then the keyboard comes up and if you tap a letter on accident theres no undo button so if you forgot to bad.

Agree with many other users. This was a lovely, simple little app before the decision to put intrusive banner ads at the top of frame. This is now taking up far too much screen space, in a terrible choice of area and impacting the clean simplicity that i previously liked. Totally get that free apps often need ads but more thought should be put into how this is implemented. This choice smacks of favouring the advertiser's needs over the user experience. This is why I've uninstalled.

It's all good apart from recently everytime I open the app I have to wait to use it as it opens a separate window for some YouTube ad. It's so annoying. I understand a free app has to have ads but this is such an annoyance as it stops me from quickly writing a note, takes me to another page and I have to close it and return to write. Think I'm going to transfer my notes to another app.

Don't get this app, reasons: 1. If connected to the internet, you will be taken to a pop up spam as that offers you some kind of prize but is bs. 2. The app often crashes on me when I'm Tryna type, being because an ad would pop up and make me click on the link by accident and screw up my writing. 3. A few times I've gone into my notes to read of them and they are just gone, nowhere to be seen, this happened mainly on unnamed notes.

title: Notes
descriptionHTML:
Notes is a good helper to manage your schedules and notes. It gives you a quick and simple notepad editing experience when you write notes, memo, email, message, shopping list and to do list. It makes to take a note easier than any other notepad and memo apps.

You also can cloud sync notes to the Google task. Let your notes more simpler and securer.

Key features:

* Add sticky note widget to your desktop, easy to open and edit your notes.
* Can be organized in folders, easy to classified your notes;
* Add Checklist for To do list & Shopping list
* Five kinds of notes background color available to change, make your notes in personalized way.
* Change the Font size;
* Transform your note into a checklist view;
* Set reminder to your notes, no longer missing you important things;
* Auto-saved. You don‚Äôt have to do anything to save them.
* Share your notes via e-mail, SMS, and etc.;
* Backup/export to SD card
* Import backup notes files.
* Sync your notes to Google task, let you sync/backup online.

More advanced features, please download to experience!
summary: Colorful notes & notepad, easy to use for Reminder, Lists, ToDo, memos, calendar

title: Notepad - Write Notes, Checklists & Reminders
description:
Notepad is an easy-to-use free notes app for Android, optimized for after-call note taking. This clear and simple notepad app allows you to make quick notes and checklists to help organize your life with great ease.

SIMPLE AND CLEAR ‚úî
This quick notepad allows you to sort notes by date or title to help you keep them in order and a useful search function will help you find specific notes if you have many saved in your list of notes. 

SHARE AND CONNECT ‚òù
All notes can easily be shared with others via your email account or various social media platforms, and a smart link to phone calls allows you to write notes or memos immediately following every phone call made or received. Connect all aspects of your communication with this smart Notepad app!

ORGANIZE YOUR TASKS ‚úç
The useful checklist function allows you to create clear checklists such as to do lists, shopping lists or task lists, and also allows you to cross out items on the list when they are completed without having to delete them, in case you need to refer to the original list later.

SMART CONNECTION TO PHONE CALLS ‚úÜ
Following every phone call Notepad is activated on your phone, allowing you to quickly make notes so that you don‚Äôt forget anything important from the call. An advanced Caller ID feature also displays detailed information about the call. Details such as caller name, number, time and much more are displayed and serve as a useful reminder when making notes.

NOTEPAD KEY FEATURES ‚úé
‚úí Clearly presented notes which can be sorted by time or name. Quickly and easily edit, save and delete notes at any time.
‚úí Easy checklist function where completed items can be marked as ‚Äòdone‚Äô.
‚úí Useful search function for those difficult-to-find notes to save time.
‚úí Backup & restore notes so that you don‚Äôt lose any important notes.
‚úí Quickly share notes with others via email, SMS or various social media platforms including Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, WhatsApp, Messenger, Skype and LinkedIn.
‚úí Create notes quickly following phone calls with a handy quick link to Notepad after every call made or received.
‚úí Identify unknown callers with the advanced caller ID feature and see detailed call information - useful when making notes after phone calls!

For your privacy and data protection we do not have access to any of your notes or store any of the information contained within them. Therefore, we recommend that you regularly use the useful backup feature on this app to avoid the accidental loss of any important information.

Install Notepad today and organize your life with this easy-to-use notepad application and enjoy a hassle-free time. Never be stuck without a pen and paper again!

comments: Actually my experience with this app has been okay except saving any updates. I have gone back into my notes looking for critical information and it just wasn't there because I didn't remember to hit the save Button before leaving the app. The only reason I don't give this app a better rating is because it seems to be standard practice in other apps to avoided this problem by automatically saving all entries. I am looking through other apps right now to see which would be the best replacement.

It's nice, but ever since this update my Notepad hasn't been working at all. I click on it and it only says that the app isn't responding. I'm not sure if I'll lose all of my information or not.. I'm sure this won't be much of a problem. And if it is at least easy to fix. Once this little bug is fixed I'm sure that everything will be fine again

I always liked this app over other notepad apps but the problem is that the new update made this app laggy and very difficult to use. I have to wait 10 seconds while on the app before being able to click on one of my notes which 10 seconds does not seem like a long time but it can be annoying

This app is not what I expected, it is just a simple note taker thing that comes up after each phone call or you can open it to write a note. i was expecting it to be more an organization app but it's is nothing but a notebook! Ugh
Aggravating. This app doesn't need access to manage calls or my contact list for what I need it to do. It still functions but I'm bombarded with popups asking for perms it doesn't need.

title: Keep My Notes - Notepad, Memo, Checklist
description:
Easy & simple notepad that you can use for quick note taking or as a private notebook.

Features:
* Offline notepad that you can use to write on all the notes to remember without the need for internet connection.
* Checklist for things that need to be done and lists.
* Notepad with password. You can make all your notes password protected.
* Memo alarm reminders for your checklist notes. The notepad alarms of the reminders can be repeated daily, monthly or yearly.
* Write notes with finger (handwritten note taking & drawings).
* Take audio notes using the voice recording notepad.
* You can set private note locks for specific notes or checklists without having to lock the entire app.
* Share your recorded notes with other apps.
* Spell check text of your notes.
* Wordpad styles : bold, italic, underline, strikethrough and highlight options.
* Sticky note widget (notes for home screen).
* Speech to text notes using android voice recognition.
* Picture attachments for notes.
* Notepad with no lines (no lines under the text of your note).
* Light theme and dark theme. Choose the theme you are most comfortable with when writing notes.
* Adjust the text font color used for writing notes.
* Control the text size used when writing notes.
* Offline backup and restore of all your recorded notes.
* Lite notepad app that opens and loads quickly.
* Can be used in portrait mode for android phones and landscape mode for android tablets.
* Free notepad.

Check the frequently asked question section on the website before asking questions:
http://www.kitetech.co/keepmynotes/frequently-asked-questions

Support page for 'Keep My Notes' : http://www.kitetech.co/keepmynotes#support

comments: easy to keep check lists, notes, add and delete items, change font size/color. I use it for my grocery list and delete items as they go in my cart. easy to see what I still need. EDIT: They've stated putting ads on the screen when you exit the app. When I could just tap the X to close it, that was OK. But now the ads are for games that can't be closed for at least 5 seconds. Really annoying!

I used to use this app every day-- it was my store everything app. But now it plays an ad when I sign in & when I'm changing from one note to another! That makes it almost worthless. When I need to make & access notes, I need to do so immediately. 15 second delays to watch ads is preposterous. I'm not playing a game, I'm working & managing my life.

UPDATE: This was good, until noisy ads that I can't mute. I'm used to jotting notes anywhere and everywhere, but now it's very embarrassing to be on the app and suddenly I get a very loud advertisement blaring from my phone, with no quick way to mute only the ads. (I wouldn't mind the ads as much, if they were quiet and could be muted immediately). OLD REVIEW: Quick and convenient. Not sure how or why, but at some point this just became my simple little go to app for notes.

I've been using this app for a long time and it's been reliable for me. The backup function is great for when you inevitable switch phones. BUT, a recent update forces video ads to play that can't be closed out when you save a note. This is hugely intrusive. I will be looking for a new note taking app and no longer reccomend this one.

Good app, but the commecial in the midst of my notes is a little unsettling. My highlights cannot be seen on the general page as a highlighted text, thats not satisfying to me. I have not found a way to forward my notes to my email. I am new to the app and still working on how best to use it. I wish l can highlight some notes but cant see how to do it!

title: NOTEBOOK - Take Notes, Sync
description:
'Google¬†PlayStore's Best App of 2017‚Äô - https://play.google.com/store/apps/topic?id=campaign_editorial_apps_productivity_bestof2017

Be more productive with this beautifully simple note-taking app. A Mac app, an¬†iOS app and web clippers for Chrome, Firefox and Safari are also available. You can log into https://notebook.zoho.com to view and take notes online.

*TAKE NOTES*
Notebook provides different ways to take notes and capture your thoughts.
- Write notes. Start with a text, add images, checklists, and audio, all in the same text note.
- Create checklists to get stuff done with the dedicated checklist note.
- Record voice notes with the audio note.
- Capture moments using the dedicated photo note.
- Scan documents and add¬†to Notebook.
- Attach Microsoft documents, PDF, and other files.

*ORGANIZE NOTES*
Keep yourself and your work organized.

- Organize various notes into notebooks.
- Create notecard stacks by grouping notes together.
- Reorder your notes within a notebook.
- Move or copy your notes between notebooks.
- Search within a notebook or across notebooks.
- Securely lock your note with passwords of your choice.
- Use your Touch ID to unlock notes.

*SYNC ACROSS DEVICES*
Access your work anywhere and everywhere with Notebook's ability to¬†sync your notes to the cloud.
- Synchronize all your notes and notebooks across devices and to the¬†cloud.
- Take a note on one device, add to it from another. Be it a device or a tablet or a computer or browsers, you name it and we have your notes there.

*NOTABLE GESTURES*
Unlike the other colorful premium notepad apps, the intimate joy of Notebook comes from using the app.
- Swipe your notebook or note for additional information.
- Pinch to group notes into a stack.
- Flick to find the note you need.
- In landscape view, pinch to fold group notes like an accordion.

*CUSTOMIZE YOUR NOTEBOOK*
Notebook provides numerous ways to customize your notes.
- Change the color of your notes.
- Choose a notebook cover or create your own.
- View your notes in either grid or landscape style views.
- Continue recording audio on any screen of your android device.

*SHARE YOUR NOTES*
Notebook provides different ways to share your ideas.
- Share your notes through email and other supporting apps.
- Export notes as PDF and share it with others.

*ANDROID EXCLUSIVE*
- Notebook Widget: View your last 20 modified notes across notebooks and find options to quickly create notes from the widget.
- Access any notebook or note with a single click by creating a shortcut.
- Multi Window Support for mobile devices running Android 7.0 and above.
- Create notes while you're in a meeting with Google Assistant Integration. Ask Google Assistant to ‚ÄôTake Note‚Äô to instantly create a note.
- Print any note using Google Cloud Print or any other preferred configurations.
- Quickly create notes using 'Launcher Shortcuts'. A long press on the app icon will reveal note creation options.

*NOTEBOOK WEB CLIPPER*
- A beautiful, customizable Clean View for more focused reading while viewing articles.
- Clip page links to create Smart Cards.
- Crop photos and screenshots and save them¬†to Notebook.


*NOTEBOOK FOR STUDENTS*
-¬†Record entire lectures using Audio Card.
- Draw diagrams and take handwritten notes during discussions with Sketch Card.
- Scan your reference books and make them available for later.¬†
- Clip research content and web page links¬†using Notebook Web Clipper.

*NOTEBOOK IN DAY-TO-DAY LIFE*

- Stay up-to-date with your daily tasks.
- Sketch down your creativity without any second thought.
- Effectively plan trips, weddings, and parties.
-¬†Make Notebook your daily journal.

*PRICE*
Notebook is 100% FREE. No catch. No advertisements either. No plus, premium modal like¬†other leading note taking apps. Boost your productivity¬†for free.

comments: Edit: Hi, its sad to write this but the app is making me frustrated. The app crash several times when I am typing like I type something and it will stop in middle, nothing works and then I have to just close it and open again. There is also the audio issue, where when I delete an audio inside a note and then open it again, the audio will be still there no matter how many times I delete it, so to delete one I have to delete the whole note. Also no way to undo the Quote if u accidentally click it.

Sync problems, previously flagged with the team, never resolved. The function just doesn't work. Was willing to put up with it since I mostly stick to my phone for notes, but having just lost my notes, I am going to uninstall. Cannot recommend. (after sync being stuck for ages, I decided to uninstall and reinstall the app to see if that would help syncing. It was not clear that notes which had been on my phone for ages, supposedly syncing, would also be lost!)

The app has now started to suck. Whenever I try to open images it crashes. Some content gets deleted automatically. Text will be visible on the windows application but not on Android application even after syncing. Please repair the bugs, I rely on this app too much. I'll update my review if the bugs are removed.

It's very simple making notes app. Sometimes it doesn't work better like before. For note making, the simplest way is to use your note book but sometimes we need a note making app in our phone when we out . But No need of this. Because this is very simple making note app. It will never make you attractive to read your notes. The best suitable ratings for this app should be 1.5 star. Because it deserves it. And if you want a note making app so download some other app, never this app.

This is the best note taking app on the play store for me. I can have as many notebooks as I want and as many notes as I need in those notebooks. The notes are not limited to one type. I can have a checklist, writing and, a picture all in one note which is hard to find in other apps. What would make this app five stars for me is being able to use pictures from my phone as notebook covers and different colored highlighters.

comments: Colorful, easy organization! ADHD Helpful. I tried many list, to do and note apps. This easily won.I love that I can change the font style and size due to vision issues. It makes me happy to see all notes instead of overwhelmed by it all. Tackling organization is fun. It's cheerful, not tedious to manage many parts of life. New fav!!

I love how i have choices on how i want to see my note, sticky note, or notepad. It also has a "to do" list. That makes it easy for me to remember the days events!! The app gets 5 stars all the way!!! Greg

Way better than the Google keep notes I had on my phone before which kept shutting down on me. It also replaced the event or reminder feature on calendar I was using. I love the variety of different styles like the brightly colored sticky notes and the notepad. Very cool I'm glad I switched!!!

One of the cuter note apps, but not for what I need. I can't put sticky notes on my home screen which was my whole purpose for installing. My Samsung phone have that app but this LG doesn't have it. I'll have to keep looking.

title: My Notes - Notepad
description:
My Notes - Notepad is an easy-to-use, intuitive, fast, elegant and secure notepad with cloud syncing (Google Drive‚Ñ¢). You can use My Notes as a notepad, notebook, journal, agenda or diary.


Key Features: 
- App lock (Password or PIN + Fingerprint).
- Save, browse, search and share notes on your smartphone and tablet. 
- Organize notes by folders.
- Sort notes by date created, date updated, title and folder.
- Add reminders.
- Manage folders.
- Navigate between notes in a horizontal position.
- Manage backups.
- Export (Text file and HTML)
- Sync notes via Google Drive between all Android devices you use. 
- Keep your notes safe in the cloud. 
- Store and display thousands of notes without any performance penalty.
- Store large notes.
- Dark theme.
- Theme color.
- Widgets.
- English language.


Premium Features:
- No ads
- Sync options > Auto sync *
- Backup > Preview
- Backup > Export > Text file and HTML

* Manual sync also works in the free version


Please remember to use the "Sync" option or the "Backup" option (in this app) to avoid accidental data loss. Especially before updating the app.


Sync details:
App data is stored in a hidden folder on your Google Drive. This folder is accessible only by "My Notes - Notepad" app. Although the folder is hidden you can see the amount of space it occupies and delete its contents.
1. Go to Google Drive on the web at "drive.google.com".
2. From the settings menu, select "Manage Apps".
3. Find the app called "KreoSoft - My Notes".


Like us on Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/KreoSoft.MyNotes


Follow us on Twitter:
https://twitter.com/KreoSoftMyNotes

comments: Hello, I greatly love your app, which is better now than before. The new features you have added makes me to return once more. But I want you to include a *vault* in the app for strictly personal notes since I hate intrusion by someone who can just read all notes at a glance. Additionally, let the vault as other vaults have a lock for absolute privacy. You can include editing features to the app as well. I think other userl like me will give you 5-stars and will go premium. Thanks

I LIKE 'My Notes' -- I can detail folders and also make appt reminder, groc lists, bills, ie folders. I cant pick colors for my folders names though. (I like not synch to Google-*BACKUP*!) ALSO, IN THE BEGINNING UNTIL THE LAST COUPLE OF UPDATES THE REMINDERS ALERTED ME TO THE ITEM ON MY LIST. NOW NO SOUND!! I'LL MIGHT JUST GET A NOTIFICATION IN TOP LEFT OR THAT MAY NOT EVEN HAPPEN AND REMEMBER I GOT SOMETHING GOING ON AND I'LL OPEN IT AND THE WHOLE EVENTS PASSED. --fix & my rating goes to 5*

I just got Google Play Pass. I saw this on there free premium. Got it and I know right away this is what I have been looking for. I have Google Keep which is good but not what I am looking for. This app is easy layout and still syncs with Google Drive. And well more to choose. Thank You!...2/3/2020/ I Had this on my tablet before. But it was dying. So I had to get a new. And I was trying out new reminder/notes apps. Then I remembered this. And thought you dummy. You know this is the best. ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê

I am loving this note app. Has everything I need. Folders, reminders, sync. It's great with a pleasant interface. After using for 1 day though (full version), I notice the reminder portion is not great. It hardly reminds. I had hoped to replace the Samsung reminder app which, is a full screen reminder. Not a dealbreaker though.

02/29/20, Text overlap issue resolved. I rely on this app: it's friendly, customizable, simple, organized, convenient, & doesn't use much space. Gets smoother with updates, swipe between notes, holds order of notes until you change it, limitless scrolling, star priority marking, schedule alarm reminders, and more! They really do work to fix problems. What if we could make 2-3 columns notes for comparisons?

title: Evernote - Notes Organizer & Daily Planner
description:
- Focus on what matters most and have access to your information when you need it.
- Input typed notes or scan handwritten notes, add to-do‚Äôs, photos, images, web pages, or audio... and it‚Äôs all instantly searchable.
- Create notebooks, organizers, planners and organize them any way you want and share with anyone.
- Sync your notes and notebooks across your devices so your information is always with you.

"Use Evernote as the place you put everything ‚Ä¶ Don‚Äôt ask yourself which device it‚Äôs on‚Äîit‚Äôs in Evernote" ‚Äì The New York Times

‚ÄúWhen it comes to taking all manner of notes and getting work done, Evernote is an indispensable tool.‚Äù ‚Äì PC Mag

*GET ORGANIZED*
‚Ä¢ Write, collect and capture ideas as searchable notes, notebooks, memos, checklists and to-do lists. It‚Äôs the only planner and organizer you need
‚Ä¢ Keep journals, documenting the news and writing the events and milestones of your daily life
‚Ä¢ Take notes and create notepads in a variety of formats, including: text, sketches, photos, audio, video, PDFs, web clippings and more
‚Ä¢ Use camera capture to easily scan and comment on pieces of paper, including printed documents, business cards, handwriting and sketches
‚Ä¢ Attach Microsoft Office docs, PDFs and photos
‚Ä¢ Create separate notepads to organize your memos, receipts, bills and invoices
‚Ä¢ Use Evernote as a digital notepad, planner and easy-to-format word processor for all your thoughts and memos as they come

*SYNC ANYWHERE* 
‚Ä¢ Sync all your notes and notebooks automatically across any computer, phone or tablet
‚Ä¢ Start your writing and task working on one device and continue on another without ever missing a beat

*SHARE YOUR IDEAS*
‚Ä¢ Create, share and discuss your notes and memos with the people who help get your work done, all in one app
‚Ä¢ Get inspired and brainstorm creative ideas by working collaboratively
‚Ä¢ Share your notepads, memos, journals, planner, organizer with your friends, colleagues or family

*EVERNOTE IN EVERYDAY LIFE*
‚Ä¢ Make personal to do lists to keep your thoughts organized by writing
‚Ä¢ Set reminders to keep on top of activities and write to-do lists
‚Ä¢ Gather, capture and store every thought you need to stay productive
‚Ä¢ Plan events such as holidays, weddings or parties
‚Ä¢ Use it as a planner to organize your life with the smart notebook
‚Ä¢ Create smart notebooks, write memos and journals on the go with the easy-to-use notepad

*EVERNOTE IN BUSINESS*
‚Ä¢ Create agendas and planners, write notes, memos, journals and craft presentations. Use it as your ultimate planner, organizer and notepad at work
‚Ä¢ Annotate documents with comments during team meetings, then share with colleagues 

*EVERNOTE IN EDUCATION*
‚Ä¢ Keep up with lecture notes so you don‚Äôt miss a vital thought
‚Ä¢ Use it as a planner and organizer to keep track of lecture notes, exams and assignments
‚Ä¢ Create different smart notebooks and planners for each class and keep everything organized
‚Ä¢ Keep track of your upcoming exams, assignments and deadlines in your planner
‚Ä¢ Clip and highlight articles from the web for academic research
‚Ä¢ Discuss and annotate notes, memos and drafts

*HOME SCREEN WIDGET*
Access Evernote easier and faster using the Home screen widget


Also available from Evernote:

EVERNOTE PREMIUM - The ultimate workspace.
‚Ä¢ 10 GB of new uploads each month
‚Ä¢ Unlimited number of devices
‚Ä¢ Access your notes and notebooks offline
‚Ä¢ Save emails to Evernote
‚Ä¢ Search inside Office docs and attachments
‚Ä¢ Annotate PDFs
‚Ä¢ Scan and digitize business cards
‚Ä¢ Show notes as presentations, instantly
$7.99 monthly, $69.99 annually

Price may vary by location. Subscriptions will be charged to your credit card through your Google account. Your subscription will automatically renew unless cancelled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. You will not be able to cancel the subscription once activated. Manage your subscriptions in Account Settings.

comments: Would be nice to have ability to save url like in Google Keep. E.g note title should have site page title and content of note is just url with pic. Edit. Thanks for that. What about separated tags that exist only for a certain notebook. It would help to separate work/personal etc notes and would simplify searching by tags when one has many.

Great. But, I'm new to evernote. But, addicted now üòç Very excited having it. But, it need some updates. It's better to show following them on the task bar: Font color, change page color, font size, font style, comment option, insert table & etc. I love it soo much. But, expecting this like google docs

Edit: seems to be fixed right now, except the formatting is still wrong. Lots of problems trying to sync when using it across different devices. I use the app on my phone and sometimes I'll try to log in on the website on my computer at work where I don't want to download the app. Whenever that happens all the formatting gets screwed up and it's so frustrating that I'm beginning to find it not worth using. There's better ways to store my information.

As of today, a few seconds after I opened the app it takes me to an upgrade screen and says I have to purchase premium. I have to work from home because of covid-19 and need my notes, and now Evernote is making me spend money? Great timing.

2020-03-15 v8.13 - insert line bug is fixed!!! Note Upload bug still there. OLD -Ver 8.12.1 installed today. Still the issue with the horizontal line inserting at the END of the note, not at the cursor position. This has been an issue since the update in June 2019. The earlier bugs with notes taking a minute to load has been fixed but some notes with graphics are still slow but more like 5-10 seconds slow. Premium user since 2013. Currently Android 7.1.1. 2020-01-17 new update; insert line bug still not fixed; also dealing with a "Note Upload" bug for several months. The app does a great job for me but these bugs are adding editing time to my day.

comments: The idea of having to pay yearly for a no ads premium version is absolutely unnecessary for simple notes. I dont mind a one time charge but these developers are definitely pushing it. This app used to be great but now your better off looking for something else, do not waste your time or money with this app. Garbage!

I enjoyed this app for years. Until I updated. The ads are so obtrusive that there's barely any room to write. I'm happy to pay $5, $6, even $10 for a useful quality app. But I'm not going to pay $10 every year to backup my to do list and grocery list to the cloud. That doesn't make sense. I will find something else.
It's a good app. Does it's job well and works exactly as advertised. You can write notes, delete notes, and edit notes. What more do you need honestly?
Good phone app for lists, notes, anything you need to keep track of. Easy to use! Ads don't interfere.
Great App to use, it'd be better if we could view the backup. I accidently deleted a note while editing and couldn't undo what i did.

comments: I love this app. Really cute and makes note taking easy. The UI is good as well as backing up to Google drive; however update the app to allow synchronisation between devices to prevent data loss due to data being overwritten when restored to a second device; to keep backing up on one device and keep restoring to a different device and remembering to do so is too manual. Also, ability to change fonts, order of to do lists, arranging notes into individual folders are very important.

I love using notepads and I can say with 110% Everybody should truly check this one out. It is by far the Best one I have ever used and I have tried out quite a lot of them. You name it, it has it. Style, color, so much to pick from and add in your own color, style,labels icons, and calendar. I recommend this one to All.

I do really like the app but I hope u guys work on some small things to improve it like getting rid of ads which appears when accessing the app cos its kinda annoying. title: Private Notepad - safe notes & lists
description:
Private Notepad is a secure notepad app that allows you to create secret notes and reminders and to organize data in lists (to do list, checklist, shopping list). Store your photos in a private vault, backup your data to the secure cloud and sync it across your devices. Text and photos are securely encrypted. Create safe notes with this notepad!

Features:
- Offline access: access your notes without internet connection
- Checklist: plan your day with to do list, make shopping list, grocery list
- Autosave: the notepad will save your notes automatically while you edit them
- Password protection: protect your notes and checklist with password, PIN-code or pattern
- Photo vault: add photos and images to your secure notes
- Encryption: your notes and photos are always stored encrypted with AES standard which is used in banking systems
- Intruder's photo: the notepad will notify you about wrong password attempts and will show you a photo of the intruder
- Fingerprint access: open your notes and checklists with one touch 
- Labels: group your notes and to do list with labels to find them easily
- Colors: make your notepad more colorful - paint your notes with your favorite colors
- Cloud sync: backup and sync your notes across your devices using the secure cloud
- Reminders: add reminders to your notes to remember important things
- Undo button: undo last changes while you edit a note or to do list
- Data hiding: enable hiding the most critical notes if someone tries to break into your private vault
- Self-destruction: enable destroying the most critical notes if someone tries to break into your private vault
- Selective protection: protect only particular notes or to do list with password
- PDF and TXT files: export your notes to PDF and TXT files or convert the existing file to your notes
- UI themes: select from several notepad themes for a custom look
- Support: FAQ will help you to work with notes, checklist and reminders. Also you can always contact support if you have some questions

Permissions
- Camera: the notepad uses it for taking pictures of intruders
- Contacts: required to backup notes to  your Google Drive 
- Storage: required for exporting notes to the phone memory
- Network access and Internet: the notepad uses it for for syncing notes with cloud
- Billing service: required for purchasing premium version¬†
- Fingerprint hardware: required for the fingerprint access
- Preventing notepad from sleeping: required for disabling the sleep mode in some situations

recentChanges:

comments: Great app for basic note saving. Love that you can lock your notes with a password. Would give it 5 stars but you cannot do a screenshot of your notes. Twice now my phone has stopped working and I've had to replace it. I lost all my notes both times. Had I been able to do screenshots this wouldn't have happened. :UPDATE: Developer replied to my review within 15 mins. It IS possible to do a screenshot if you disable the password. 5 STARS!!

A most fantastic app for keeping a private diary of thoughts/journaling! I've been using it for a few years & it's been very reliable & easy to use. Highly recommended. Edit 2020-02-09: My old phone broke & I restored my notes from the cloud. But my manual sort order (reverse alpha) was lost. So now my newest notes are at the bottom of about 200 notes & the app won't sort in reverse order! I emailed Support, but they said that's the way it is. So I'm reducing my rating until they fix it! Easy?

Was using this app for a while, but just recently factory reset my phone. Tried to restore my notes from the cloud, but I have none of them. Worked well up until this point. Edit: I was able to get some of my notes restored, but some were still lost, even though I used the same account as before.

The developer helped me in resolving the issue of restoring the backed up data from google drive. Now its back to normal. Kudos to the entire team. Keep Working like this. You have an amazing product.

Best app ever. Private. Asking for passwprd or fingerprint everytime. Locks even after 1 min or of use. Such easy acess to store information. Which transfers online or to another phone woth no problem. Everything is always still there.

title: Raloco Notes
description:
‚Ä¢ Not overloaded nice looking interface
‚Ä¢ Notes organization by color
‚Ä¢ Beautiful fonts
‚Ä¢ Simple intuitive functionality
‚Ä¢ No advertisement
‚Ä¢ Reminders
‚Ä¢ Sync with multiple devices
‚Ä¢ Password protection
‚Ä¢ Widgets

Use this extremely user friendly app to easily capture what‚Äôs on your mind. This app does not support photo of a poster, receipt or document it is intended to be a simple and beautiful text only editor. Its really easier than any other notepad and memo apps. Various colors and sorting methods together with custom font selection is one the most beloved features from our clients.

FAQ:

Q: How do I sync/transfer all notes to other device?
A: From apps main screen go to settings/backup/transfer. Send exported file by email and open it on other device. All notes will be imported. 

Q: How do I rename note, change color or font?
A: Open desired note. Under the top right corner of your screen find three vertical dots menu. Click on menu and find appropriate option from the list. Depending on your android version menu list may show up by pressing options button down on your screen or phone panel.

Q: How do I password protect my notes?
A: Open main app window where list of all notes is located. Long press on desired note and wait till new options menu show up. Select password protect. You can reset passwords from apps master settings.

Q: How do I enter master notes settings?
A: Open main app window where list of all notes is located. Under the top right corner of your screen find three vertical dots menu. Depending on your android version menu list may show up by pressing options button down on your screen or phone panel.

Q: How do I put a note widget on the home screen (sticker)?
A: Under the home screen hold down your finger on an empty space once the new window arise choose widget. Find Raloco Color Notes from the list and position it on your home screen.

Q: How do I find backed up notes?
A: All you backed up notes are stored in a single file. Which is usually located here: 
"/data/KenzapNotes"
or here:
"/Android/data/com.kenzap.notes/files"

comments: Been using it for over 7 years now. Still lovin it! Minimalist ad banner at top of screen (for the free version) is not a distraction like so many are. Such a good app! I'd have gladly paid $20 for a pro version just to show support and appreciation for the utility of this app, but unfortunately, their only upgrade option is a recurring subscription fee. I'm very generous with even the pricier pro upgrades, but I will never pay a recurring subscription fee for an app. Hint hint, dev team!

I'm super upset. I lost three years worth of notes: recipes, songs, poems, dream diaries and passwords. All when I got a new phone due to some sync error. This app was so useful. Until I lost three years of progress that I did not have recorded anywhere else. If they are willing to help fix it I might change my review but personally. I'm super upset with this app and it's people.

I've used the paid upgraded service for a couple months now with unlimited instant updates across all my devices. So far I find myself using it multiple times on a daily basis and it now helps me be and feel alot more mentally organized. I use it for shopping lists, to do task lists, life goal bucket list and even upcoming bill due dates and keeps me on track by not paying late fees anymore. Works out great for me and feels like having your own personal private assistant. A+ Highly Recommend!

First app I dl! It's just amazing. Don't forget anything! Appointments and whatever you like. In date ordered. Could not see a phone without this app and can connect with cloud. Without any problem. Don't take long and your all set. Remember your music, TV shows, doctors appointments etc.

Great for taking notes, reminders etc, can't fault it BUT suddenly I can't open the app unless I agree that it and Google can access all my personal info... Two options given, allow or deny.... and guess what? Press 'Deny' and you're in an endless loop of allow or deny windows.... Time to uninstall... except I can't access the information stored on notepad unless I agree to sharing all my personal info! B*t#r*s!

title: Safe Notes - Secure Ad-free notepad
description:
Password-protected notepad that's safe, fast,  easy to use and ad-free!

‚úî Protect notes and to do lists with password, and lock the whole notepad app with the PIN.
‚úî Copy any text from your phone to your computer (app-to-browser).
‚úî Write colorful notes, memos, emails, to-do lists, and encrypt them if you want.
‚úî Custom note colors / fonts / text size / sorting order / etc.

‚úî Sync notes online and access them both through a web browser and Safe Notes app.
‚úî Taking notes with Safe Notes is as easy as it gets.
‚úî You can sync individual notes with ProtectedText.com, and access them from this app and through a web browser.
‚úî Safe Notes provides ultimate security - you don't have to trust us, or any other third-party to be completely secure (read more under FAQ on www.protectedtext.com).

‚úî Unlimited text size (up to ~250 000 characters per note)
‚úî Search function
‚úî Simple safe password encrypted notepad!


--- How it works ---

‚òÖ When an individual note is locked, the password is permanently removed from your smartphone, and the note can't be decrypted without your password. You don't have to trust us, or any other third-party, since your password isn't stored anywhere.
‚òÖ You can sync individual notes online to ProtectedText.com and access them with a web browser. No registration or email address is needed. A note can be stored under any URL you'd like to use, e.g. yourname/sometitle, and then accessed through the app or online at ProtectedText.com/yourname/sometitle
The first user to use a specific URL owns it (by knowing the password that was used to encrypt the note on that URL).
‚òÖ The password never leaves your device, not even when notes are being synced online. Syncing notes with ProtectedText.com only stores encrypted text.
‚òÖ We can't decrypt your notes even if we wanted to. That gives you the ultimate security, but it also means that a lost password can never be recovered.
‚òÖ You can modify the same note on multiple devices, and when you sync notes, you'll be informed if there is a possibility that a note will be overridden by changes made in the meantime.
‚òÖ Deleting synced notes from your smartphone doesn't remove the online copy, so you can recover it later. But you can permanently delete notes directly through ProtectedText.com website.
‚òÖ Notes can be shared with friends by giving them the password to access your note.
‚òÖ This is the official app for the open source and non-profit service www.ProtectedText.com. Read more on: https://www.protectedtext.com/

Safe Notes is a simple and secure password protected notepad for all your notes, memos, messages, emails and to-do lists.

Technical details: Both Safe Notes app and ProtectedText.com website use AES algorithm for encrypting/decrypting the content, together will 'salts' and other known good practices to achieve exceptional security; and SHA512 algorithm for hashing. On top of that, all data is only provided through SSL.

recentChanges: Stability improvements and bug fixes.
comments: Refreshingly different from other apps. I wanted somewhere safe for making simple notes and life goals etc. This does that without complicating things. The app is pin protected and I can have different colour notes with the option of secure online access. I've used Evernote before but this app is much better. Thank you for providing the important things without gimmicks. Would recommend.

Amazing app, easy to use and fully customizable. The password protection is princess. Maybe if the future they'll add the option in setting to auto lock notes on exit, right now you have to remember to do it manually. But that isn't a big deal for me. Moreover it's free and ad free, so thank you developer for making this app and sharing it with everyone with no strings attached.

The only problem I have with this app is I cannot attach pictures to the notes. Sometimes I will screen shot information that I need but can't put it in a note for later and future use. I will be uninstalling this app as soon as I find a notes app that will allow me to lock my notes (which this one does) and attach pictures.

Good potentials. In setting there should be an option to auto lock note on exit. As the app is lock note, is it appropriate to have the option to leave it unlocked. I'm short, encryption and auto lock should be by default. To speed process, finger print access to app can be employed. A 2nd finger encryption can be used to lock and unlock notes . Good luck.

Great, but I am concerned about the security level of the App-locking PIN; why only numbers? A string of numbers on their own makes a very weak password. Yes, you can add a strong password/passphrase to each note, but what about the titles/names you give to each note?... these get revealed by only typing in a sequence of numbers to open the app. There should, at least, be an 'option' in the settings to allow the user to choose a simple PIN or a more secure password/passphrase. Safe and secure?

title: Squid - Take Notes & Markup PDFs
description:
New: We partnered with Google to bring incredibly fast, low-latency ink to Squid on the Google Pixelbook and Samsung Chromebook Plus (with Chrome 62). See the difference: https://youtu.be/Oc66T_e7xwU

Take handwritten notes naturally on your Android tablet, phone, or Chromebook supporting Android apps! With Squid you can write just like you would on paper using an active pen, passive stylus, or your finger.

Easily markup PDFs to fill out forms, edit/grade papers, or sign documents. Import images, draw shapes, and add typed text to your notes. Quickly select, copy/paste, and move content between pages and notes. Organize your notes within notebooks and increase your productivity!

Turn your device into a virtual whiteboard or give presentations in a class, meeting, or conference by wirelessly casting to a TV/projector (e.g. using Miracast, Chromecast). Export notes as PDFs or images, then share them with others or store them in the cloud!

Squid is vector based - keeping your notes beautiful at any zoom level and on any device. You can erase entire letters and words quickly with the stroke eraser tool, or just parts of words with the true eraser tool. The selection tool allows you to change the color and thickness of your handwriting and even resize a drawing whenever you want without any loss in quality.

Squid takes special advantage of active pens on capable devices to provide natural, pressure sensitive handwriting. Just write with the pen and erase with your finger!

Squid is designed to be both powerful and simple to use, allowing you to take notes quickly and efficiently.

Awards/Recognition
‚Ä¢ Featured App in Google Play
‚Ä¢ Category Honorable Mention for Productivity in the Samsung Galaxy Note S Pen App Challenge: https://goo.gl/Ji9dCS
‚Ä¢ Popular Choice Award in the Dual Screen App Challenge: https://goo.gl/J7uT0B

Key Features
‚Ä¢ Take notes naturally with a pen and erase with your finger on active pen enabled devices (e.g. Galaxy Note devices with S Pen)
‚Ä¢ Take notes with your finger or passive stylus on non-active pen devices (e.g. Nexus 7)
‚Ä¢ Vector graphics engine
‚Ä¢ Multiple paper types (e.g. blank, ruled, graph) and sizes (e.g. infinite, letter, A4)
‚Ä¢ Undo/redo, select, move, and resize
‚Ä¢ Change the color and weight of selected items
‚Ä¢ Cut, copy, and paste items between notes
‚Ä¢ Two finger scroll and pinch-to-zoom
‚Ä¢ Two finger double tap to quickly jump to a specific zoom level
‚Ä¢ Organize notes within notebooks
‚Ä¢ Sort notes and notebooks
‚Ä¢ Import, crop, and resize images
‚Ä¢ Export notes to PDF, PNG, or JPEG for printing, archiving, or sharing
‚Ä¢ Share notes with friends and colleagues via email, Evernote, etc.
‚Ä¢ Multi-Window support
‚Ä¢ Shortcuts to create a new note or open a notebook
‚Ä¢ Present notes on a secondary display via HDMI, Chromecast, etc. (Android 4.2+)

Squid Premium
‚Ä¢ Create notes and pages with premium backgrounds (math, engineering, music, sports, etc.)
‚Ä¢ Import PDFs and mark them up like any other note
‚Ä¢ Express yourself with additional tools (highlighter, ‚Äútrue‚Äù eraser, shapes, text)
‚Ä¢ Backup/restore and bulk export notes as PDFs to cloud storage providers Dropbox and Box

Learn more about Squid Premium: https://goo.gl/mJFjeO

G Suite for Education customers can purchase Squid Premium in bulk using the Squid EDU Bulk License app (https://goo.gl/Kkxjtk).

Information about active pen devices: https://goo.gl/6BRJy

Explanation of required permissions: https://goo.gl/q5f8Y

If you encounter any bugs, please email us at help+android@squidnotes.com with a description of the bug!

We would love to hear any feedback or feature requests you have at http://feedback.squidnotes.com.

Interested in beta testing? Join our public beta directly through Google Play!

comments: I loved this app. Seriously considered switching to this exclusively, however, there are some drawbacks. One, there isn't an option to sync to onedrive or googledrive. Huge issue for me, considering I really wanted a way to store all my notes in college. Two, I hate the organization of this app. I can't make folders or subfolders or color coding. Three, I hate the fact that I can't type notes as well. Sometimes I want to handwrite but other times I don't. I hope they update soon.

There is an ink problem with using the Pixelbook Pen with i7 250 gb Pixel Slate. I tried using low-latency link but that introduces a horrible lag. While writing with the pen, sometimes the it just stops writing and then the writting that I did 5 seconds ago appears. If not it just leaves a dotted mark sometime rather than writing what I want it to write. A fix would be helpful given that I'm paid for the premium features.

Liked it and upgraded to "Pro" as I needed to annotate some PDF files but then didn't use it for a few months. Can't use it now that I need it for more PDF work because it insists I "Upgrade to Pro" again. Nope. Six-fifty every few months is too expensive. Not gonna happen. There are other PDF tools that once bought, stay bought. Uninstalled.

it has limited options like: (1). you can't copy a pdf file and insert on the note page. (2). it lacks objects e.g. shapes and fills that may as be like the available in good notes. (3) it does not have the option of hand write to text choice fonts. However, it is a good app only for note taking. You may have some difficulties if you are a good notes user. I may be bias with this but this is my opinion only. thanks

Hi everyone, I tried several comparable apps for handwriting. I really suffered from a lag between touching the screen and an actual response, it made handwriting almost impossible. But in Squid such a lag is not noticeable, I just set a scale to 1000% and used my laptop as a paper notepad, loosing only a small amount of speed (but I guess it's due to my laptop and a pen itself, but not the software) I really like this app and appreciate your work, thank you guys P. S. I miss a calender option

title: Notes
description:
Save and manage your notes with this notebook.

You can:

* Create simple notes or checking (todo) lists, and attach images, set reminders.

* Add categories (colors) to notes, filter notes with colors, create new colors.

* Push important notes to the notifications area or widget in the desktop, so they're always in sight. Or pin its in the top of the list.

* Secure your notes with a password (using AES encrytpion).

* Simply search notes using text.

* Create notes from other apps, using 'share'.

* Reserve your notes with import/export to memory or Google Drive. You can view notes (gdrive backup) on https://tonote.github.io

Write your suggestions to improve the app.
