summary: Simple notes with colors, notifications, desktop widgets, encryption, reminders
recentChanges: Errors fixed
comments: Simply Superb! Overlooked this app due to the busy interface but shortly came back after many apps simply offering bits & pieces. Exercise patience a few extra minutes, enter a couple notes & experience the free features included & well-thought interface with this supurb app. Back up solutions & plenty of options. Only issue I've found is there are no fast entry widgets, all have to hit -back -back when done editing. Otherwise, yes, donation -take a spin without experiencing ads. Thank You!
Great app, the only thing is missing and keeping me from not fully use it. is to be able to back up localy with attachemens, images are important.
A note app that doesnt bomb you with ads,simple and fast
I've tried a hell lot of note keeping apps and this one is one of my favourites.

I've paid $3.99 to suport the developer 6 minutes ago, there is ABSOUTE NO TEXT FORMATTING supported, no color text, no bold, no itelic, no crossing out... none, remained as a free version. I want my money back!

title: WeNote - Color Notes, To-do, Reminders & Calendar
description:
Best notepad on earth.

WeNote is a simple and easy to use note taking app. You can create color notes, to-do lists, reminders and calendar quickly.

You can lock notes and to-do lists via PIN, pattern, password or fingerprint, to protect confidential information.

When you write down notes, emails, phone numbers, messages, cooking recipes, diary, journal, shopping lists and to-do lists, you will realize this is the easiest and quickest to use notepad on earth. üòÅ

WeNote is a privacy-focused notepad. WeNote can work offline perfectly, even without Internet connection. No login required.

You may jot down note on the go, if anything came across your mind. No complicated step. No internet required. Once you see WeNote, you will instantly know how to use it to organize your life. 

WeNote enables effortless setup reminder by taking notes on the calendar. WeNote reminds you of the saved note on the date, so that you will never miss anything important.

WeNote makes note taking so much easy!


Features
‚Ä¢ Create color notes and to-do lists
‚Ä¢ Organize using label and color
‚Ä¢ Labels designed as tabs, to let you swipe between labels in blazing fast speed
‚Ä¢ Pictures as attachment. A picture is worth a thousand words. You can add unlimited pictures into a note
‚Ä¢ Drawing and handwriting as attachment
‚Ä¢ Audio recording allows hands free note-taking. You can add unlimited audio recordings into a note. (Premium)
‚Ä¢ Lock app, notes and to-do lists via PIN, pattern, password or fingerprint
‚Ä¢ Completed to-do lists will move to bottom
‚Ä¢ Customize via various fonts, viewing modes and sorting modes
‚Ä¢ 11 different color themes including French rose pink. You can change the app color theme based on your personal taste. (Premium)
‚Ä¢ Unlimited color choices are available for you to categorize and organize notes easily. (Premium)
‚Ä¢ Reminders and calendar, with lunar calendar supported
‚Ä¢ Advanced reminder. Able to repeat daily, weekly, monthly, yearly, and highly customizable
‚Ä¢ Stick note to status bar
‚Ä¢ Secure sync to cloud storage
‚Ä¢ Local backup and restore
‚Ä¢ Share note and attachment to email, SMS, social networking & messaging apps
‚Ä¢ Accept shared note and attachment from other apps
‚Ä¢ Switch between note and to-do lists, seamlessly
‚Ä¢ Search notes and to-do lists, instantly
‚Ä¢ Various types of home widget - Note list (Premium), Calendar (Premium), Quick add, Sticky note


Free Trial
7 days free trial is provided for every premium feature. You may extend free trial period, by watching rewarded video ad.


Ad
WeNote is ad-free for the first 28 days. After that, a small banner ad will be shown at the screen bottom. This is to make WeNote development work sustainable. Ad can be removed via one-time in-app purchase.


Data Reliability
We place great emphasis on data reliability. We provide 2 reliable ways, to ensure you will never lose any notes, to-do lists, attachments.

‚Ä¢ Secure sync to cloud storage: This is the most recommended way, to avoid data loss. After sync, the data is stored in cloud storage App Data folder. For security purpose, cloud storage App Data folder is not visible to user.

‚Ä¢ Local backup and restore: If you have privacy concern on storing the data in cloud storage, you may use this way to avoid data loss. Backups are removed when WeNote is uninstalled.

Of course, you may choose to use both ways too.

Please refer to https://www.wenote.me/faq#h.p_MCAbHUyem5hi if you can't sync to cloud storage.


Reminder
Reminder doesn't work reliably for certain devices. Their over aggressive Battery management mode, have prevent reminder to work in background. Please turn off that "feature", allow WeNote runs in background, if you want reminder to work reliably.

Please read https://dontkillmyapp.com/?3 for solution.


Home Widget
Long press on desktop home screen, you may choose between various home widgets.

comments: Great app, best in it's category of what I have found in my years of to do list apps. Chocked full of great features. I used to use colornote until I found this app. It would be 5 stars, but they recently started putting ads and a paid version. I would be all for a one time purchase of 5 or 10 dollars, but it is more than that. I am very glad the developers did not go with a subscription based app; those are terrible. I get the need for a paid version of the app, but not $5 for each feature.....

I love this app! Not to be dramatic or anything but it's kinda changed my life. So many awesome features (for free!!) that make it so much easier for me to stay organized and not forget things I need to do, places I need to go, ideas I have for later, etc. Just useful in so many ways, I've recommended it to several friends already.

Really great App. I use it to manage my brain and my business. It takes the place of tons of sticky notes and notebooks. I show it to my clients too so they can stay more organized. Two things I would like to see would be to have an ability to Bold and Underline text as well as having a Tab feature so if I want to make a few lists within one "note" I can do that with multiple titles and subtitles. Also, I would like it if the Calendar would link with my Google Calendar, or I could delete the calendar page. Still, very nice app. A bit similar to Google Keep Notes, but I like the page tabs on this a bit better.

I love this. It is a beautiful interface. It is so intuitive right out of the box, it feels like I have used it for years. The developers took extra care making it user friendly. I know app development is expensive. I used to work in software development. That is why I didn't mind buying the extras. I would rather have one great app instead of several okay apps.

Latest version changelog: "Bugfix: Stability fix." Ohh, and ads are added with option to remove them for 10$+. This does not seem right, to introduce ads this way. I know the app needs some kind of financial support, but not by introducing "features" in non transparent way. Edit: Changelog is updated. Price for ad-free version is a little steep.

title: Notes (Super Simple Notes)
description:
Minimalist user interface, clean design, great experience.

You can adjust the text size with the volume buttons.

Use colors to organize notes. Optionally add labels to colors. Eight eye catching colors are included, and eight more are available as in-app purchases.

Widget is included. Optional dark theme. Add reminders to notes.


You can export your notes to Google Drive or to external storage (SD card). Importing will not create duplicates. Only new or updated notes will be imported. You can use Google Drive to synchronize notes between your devices.

Option to automatically backup to Google Drive.

comments: I'm a big fan of this app! There's something just great about it! It's terrific! One suggestion though: How about making it so I can get my note back should I accidentally delete it? Update on review written on 2/1/20: Thank you for your kind and thoughtful reply to my comment. Your information about deletion was both helpful and informative. Love your app! Keep up the good work!

Nice, quick, easy, note app. Great for jotting down finds on the internet, making reminders, it alarms, and general note taking. It has a very nice selection of fonts you can choose, and you can color you're notes. Wish though, it had simple date and time capabilities. l use this app for just about everything. Don't care for the lastest update, where I now must wait for the app's title to appear, and dissapear, before I can use it. Slows me down, and not necessary.
It's super and simple... And Google backup is so helpful for safety of notes. Very useful app.
I use it daily. I wish Search highlighted the word (like ColorNotes) when found or you may have to manually search a 5000 word document! GDrive backup is great.
I love this simple app! I use notes for everything, from shopping and to do lists to copy and paste quotes and recipes. I literally open it at least 3 times a day.

comments: This is a neat application for taking notes. Although I have not yet done much with it, it looks that it has great potential. The funniest part is a comment in one of the screenshots. ‚ÄúThey don‚Äôt make bugs like Bunny anymore.‚Äù I recently watched some clips of Space Jam for the first time in a long time and some Bugs Bunny moments with a friend. The funniest moment was when Bugs was given an eye exam. Bugs read the fine print on the chart flawlessly, while the examiner used a magnifying glass. ü§£

An easy 5 stars. I love good design and this is great design. It's a bit like Pinterest but more flexible. E.g. I can add not just one but several pictures above notes or a checklist (so useful), and I can add voice, and I can change the box colour to match my pictures, and other stuff too. My notes just got beautiful. The more I use it the more I love it.

(Almost) all you need for notes with a sleek design. The design is elegant and easy to use. Great is that you can attach anything to a note. The only thing, I'm missing is a way to sync or export the notes with WebDAV and it would be great, if you can tick checklist items off by swiping

Amazing app. Searching for a long long time for an app this complete and easy to use. Notes, reminders, checklists, labels, pin to notification bar, star as favourite etc. Very customizable but not overwelming. Automatic backup to Google Drive and the possibility to share a note including atachements via email.

Sometimes I feel badly in need - customize the serial number which would go first, which would go 2nd? If I select 'title' then I don't get ascending/descending as my wish. If I select colour, then too I don't get my wishing serial. So I am wanting to tell you that add such a system so that I/we all can customize the serial number that whiich would be first, second or so on. (As our wish by customizing). Such, in youtube, if I make a playlist, I can place a video on bottom, top or as my wish.

comments: So far so good. I had to find a new notepad as my other one has just recently erupted with adverts that I cannot bypass. The video ones that go on for 30 seconds or more. Imagine, you want to have a quick look at one of your notes and you have to go through all that palaver! Anyway, this is as free and succinct. I like it.

RIDICULOUS-Should account for simple mistakes, Gmail & old-school voicemail do..but not this app! I accidentally tapped the close without saving tab and my list? GONE. ACCESS? DENIED. I mean, OF COURSE I MAKE MISTAKES, THAT'S WHY I NEED A DANG TO-DO LIST APP TO HELP, not accentuate my silly mistakes. And THIS? Definitely not on my to-do list!
Love the app! I just wish I could purchase it so that I could support the dev without ads. I'd even be willing to purchase it every month, as long as I could use my Google Play Store credit.

Just what I needed, works just like they say. Perfect for creating a quick fast note, organizes your entries and saves each document upon exit so nothing is lost. I seldom leave reviews but this product deserved one.

Wonderful app...FAST! QUICK! @ TO THE POINT! Great for when im coming up with new book, poem, or musical song thoughts and ideas! Thanks for making this app works PERFECT for what im using it for! Sincerely, Jesse

title: My Binder: Tabbed Notes
description:
Great for school notes, work notes, to-do notes, as a journal, to write stories, or just as a notepad.  Create unlimited notebooks, each with 5 colored coded tabs with the ability to add unlimited pages per tab, to help you organize your notes.  

Export/Import your data for backups and/or transfer to other devices.

To help organize, change Notebook color to Blue, Red, Yellow, Green, Orange, White, or Black.

In addition to notebook colors, enhance organization by sorting your notebooks by Create Date (newest to oldest), Notebook Name (alphabetical), Last Opened(most recently opened to oldest), or group the notebooks by their color.

Long Press notebook for quick access to edit labels, notebook color, or to deleted the selected notebook.  Touch notebook, add notes, touch color coded tab to change notebook tab.  Click on the left and right arrows to navigate/add new pages to the tab.  Tabs are color coded and allow you to add text to label them.  Notes save automatically.  Option to email or text notebook contents also.  Ability to select individual tabs to email/text.

Click on Highlighter to toggle highlighting of text on and off.

Long Press on Notebook Tabs for more options to edit tab default settings, and Delete current page.

Ability to change default page font.  Choose between 12, 14, 16, 18, 20, and 22 font size.  Save default font size for each notebook tab.

Ability to change default page and tab label font style.  Choose between the Default Android text and Segoe Script.  Save defaults for each tab.

Ability to move app from phone to SD card from device settings.

Great app to satisfy your notepad and notebook needs.  This note organizer is a simple and effective way to keep track of your notes.

comments: Best binder ever! However I have two issues: 1) there is no undelete function and 2) the e-mail functionality does not work (on any of the various devices I've tried). Fix that and you get 6 stars instead of 5 üòâ . Other than that, I love this app and would recommend it to anyone.

There are some things I like about the app but it's not for me. It looks good and is easy to set up and use. I like the ability to add multiple pages behind each tab and the limit of 5 tabs doesn't seem a problem. However, the absence of a search function and an 'undo' facility does make it something I would use for appearance rather than functionality. It's never going to be my 'go-to' app, I'm afraid.

I really like this for listing meds by family members, shopping list by store name etc. An added feature would be the ability to add tabs to a binder. I know you can add binders, but sometimes you need extra tabs given a folders category.

The keyboard button should appear at the top of the menu bar. The keyboard should be shown after this button is pressed. The original page should be the same without any change. Thank you. This is a very good application.
I really dig the multiple tabs within the multiple notebooks, and the lined paper is a nice touch.

comments: Really like, but there are a couple of things that I wish were different. Like, they have the Font Size button/option, but you can never change the font size; every time you try, it says "Font Size Cannot be Changed." Why have it if you can't change it?? Also, I do understand ads... if it was a game or something, but this is for notes and organization; I shouldn't have to watch ads or see them at the top of the screen when I need to make a note of something or make my grocery list.

I like this app because, I think that it is really helpful to the people who have a really busy schedule! Also i think it is a wonderful because it helps you get your thoughts in order and spread everything out into one app instead of having multiple apps to look after!

On the "To do list" the set reminder could use more options for reminding. There's no set starting and stop option or all day reminder. Plus no option for notifications sounds to choose from your device setup. However the app is good. But needs more options, bells and whistles ‚ò∫Ô∏èüëç

Awesome application for your to-do tasks, business meetings, hangouts,etc. I would highly recommend this as that you could turn on the alarms and off, type in the future events, and so much more. This is the best app I've ever encountered so far in memos and notes, and again I strongly recommend this app. Beginner planners, use. this. app. BEST. APP. EVER. And Pro Data Doctor, your gift of making and coding apps for memo and notes really stretches. Keep up the hard work!

I really enjoy this very versatile and well organized app. Really, it's the best all purpose app for keeping track of appointments, making lists, jotting down notes, and keeping track of household chores. It's easy, fun, and colorful, and even has voice memo capability. Kudos to the developer...well done! Definitely 5 Stars.

comments: I got this app for the realistic sticky notes and stayed for it. I also like the option of fonts, font colour and size. Sadly, that bugged out after a while and the font wouldn't change from default. The UI of the app is a bit awkward and outdated, and choosing from a visible of options would be smoother than sequential choosing. This app has potential and I could see it being like textgram. Ads are fine.

UPDATED: Thank you for removing those ads! LOVE, LOVE, LOVE this app again! ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ I would have given 10 stars before the ads and will gladly pay to get back what I had last week. I had enjoyed using the app all the time, now it is extremely difficult to amend or make up new memos because I can't see what I am typing. I really hope to love this app again if you make corrections.

Wonderful little app and widgets. Just enough customisation choices for variety without being overwhelming. Font choices seem to stop working on the widgets at a certain size, and a text size between 18 (tiny) and 26 (huge) would be incredibly useful. Otherwise, I'm impressed. My days of installing, testing and subsequently deleting endless sticky note apps are finally done.

Fantastic! There's no reason to forget anything of importance anymore, just flick one or more of these onto your home screen. I've been using it (on & off) for years and I'm a happy chappy. Ps. Dev, Thanks for opening up all features for a small sacrifice of unobtrusively small ads.

Jan 2020 1st... Developers quick to respond to my earlier post.. this is a really nice app. Easy to use and l have been able to put all the notes l wanted onto the notes ie large as in A4 size plus plus... like the variety of choice of notes and colours.. flowers one would be nice... Realky liked it but now all this ad business, was really one of the best of these apps out there. I am annoyed l paid then soon after you made it product free so you can place ads!!! Glad you get 2 stars

title: Standard Notes
description:
Standard Notes is a simple and private notes app. It syncs your notes securely across all your devices, including your Android devices, Windows, iOS, Linux, and Web.

Private means your notes are end-to-end encrypted, so only you can read your notes. Even we can't read the contents of your notes.

Simple means it does one job and does it well. Standard Notes is a safe and lasting place for your life's work. Our focus is making it easy to write notes wherever you are and syncing them with encryption to all your devices.

Our users love us for:
‚Ä¢ Personal Notes
‚Ä¢ Tasks & Todos
‚Ä¢ Passwords & Keys
‚Ä¢ Code & Technical Procedures
‚Ä¢ Private Journal
‚Ä¢ Meeting Notes
‚Ä¢ Cross-platform Scratchpad
‚Ä¢ Books, Recipes, & Movies
‚Ä¢ Health & Fitness Log

Standard Notes comes free with:
‚Ä¢ Seamless sync across all your devices, with easy to use applications on Android, Windows, Linux, iPhone, iPad, Mac, and web browsers.
‚Ä¢ Offline access, so you can access your downloaded notes even without a connection.
‚Ä¢ No limit on number of devices.
‚Ä¢ No limit on number of notes.
‚Ä¢ Passcode lock protection, along with fingerprint protection.
‚Ä¢ A tagging system to organize your notes (like #work, #ideas, #passwords, #crypto).
‚Ä¢ The ability to pin, lock, protect, and move notes to trash, which allows you to recover deleted notes until the trash is emptied.

Standard Notes is completely open-source, which means when we say your notes are encrypted with AES-256 encryption, and that only you can read your notes, you don't have to take our word for it. Our code is open to the world to audit.

We made Standard Notes simple because longevity is important to us. We want to make sure we're here, protecting your notes, for the next hundred years. You shouldn't have to find a new notes app every year.

To sustain our development, we offer an optional paid program called Standard Notes Extended. Extended gives you access to powerful tools including:
‚Ä¢ Productivity editors (like Markdown, Code, Spreadsheets)
‚Ä¢ Beautiful themes (like Midnight, Focus, Solarized Dark)
‚Ä¢ Powerful cloud tools including daily backups of your encrypted data delivered to your email inbox every day, or backed up to your cloud provider (like Dropbox and Google Drive).

You can learn more about Extended at standardnotes.org/extended.

We're always happy to talk, whether it be a question, thought, or issue. Please feel free to email us any time at help@standardnotes.org. When you take the time to send us a message, we'll be sure to do the same.

recentChanges:
- Adds ability to specify existing themes as either the Dark Mode default or Light Mode default. You can access these options by long-pressing on a theme.
- Removes splash screen for new users that required them to sign in or register, and instead shows a non-obtrusive banner in the list of notes reminding users to register to keep their notes backed up.
comments: This app provides an excellent haven from all the intrusion we have to put up with these days. It has a polished feel as well as being user-friendly with a simple, light structure. I'm more than happy to support the devs with a paid subscription as they are not just providing everyone with a reliable and secure place for note taking and file storage, they are hosting syncing services as well which you can't do for free. The extensions which are made available in return are well worth it.

I am moving away from using One Note in favor of this and I'm really blown away by the capabilities offered through the extensions, notes in markdown is just what I needed and it's super cool to have the flexibility exactly the way you want it as a user. The only thing that jumps out to me as missing right now is the ability to draw using touch screens. 10/10 otherwise!!

I love the concept, business plan, and privacy, but the apps need work. On a Google Pixel 2 running Android 9 the app refuses to unlock after the phone is put in standby. You have to close the app and reopen it which is a huge pain. I've also had sync issues across multiple devices where sometimes Standard Notes creates another copy when it detects a conflict and sometimes just gives up and forces you to log out and start over potentially losing data on that device. OneNote wins on sync.

Love it! After I switched away from Googles services, I tried out about 15 different notes apps to replace Keep, and Standard Notes is hands-down the winner. Awesome job guys, keep it up! If you upgrade to the pro version, there's tons of plugins and features: tags, editors, themes, secure lock, pin notes ets. And it's truly cross-platform too! This makes it a viable alternative to EverNote, OneNote, Dropbox Paper etc. The difference with S Notes is that it's secure, private and trustworthy

It seems like a great app but I think having a list option (as in checklist) would be a very nice improvement to see added sometime. Other than that, at first glance I think it has everything I want, so thanks.

title: Classic Notes Lite - Notepad
description:
Classic Notes is designed to be a straightforward and simple to use notepad application yet powerful and feature rich at the same time. Classic Notes is much more than a standard notepad. Also included is a vast assortment of utilities which can be found in the extras section. Think of this application as a sort of multi-tool. Please continue reading to learn more.

* Notepad Features *
- In addition to standard notes and memos,  Classic Notes also includes shopping lists, paint or sketch notes, and to-do lists. 
- As mentioned above, one of the goals when designing this application was to be feature rich but with ease of use in mind. To access additional features when writing a note simply click the edit button located at the top left to gain access to a wide array of additional options. 
- Some of these options include: attaching audio, video, and image files, tagging, setting priority based on urgency, reminders and alarms, password protection, comments also known as sub-notes, linking notes and to-do's together, pinning notes to the status bar or home screen, detailed note information such as word and character count, you can even look at the history of a note and revert to previous states. This is just a small handful of what's available. There are many more features to explore!
- Also included is a trash bin so you never have to worry about accidentally deleting a note again.

* Extras *
- In addition to being a notepad, Classic Notes also features numerous useful utilities which can be accessed from the extras menu. This is where the multi-tool part comes in.
- Some of these utilities include an extremely capable unit converter with over 100 different types of conversions and thousands of different units to choose from, a powerful random number generator utility, full-featured finance, numerical, fitness, and audio calculators, and a days until countdown timer are just a small handful of what's available.I could on and on about all the features and utilities available but I'd run out of space. 
- Utilities also include the option to make a note of the data for later use. For instance, say one is using the fitness calculator to look up their target heart rate. There is no need to copy and paste the results, simply click the note option and all values are recorded into a new note for easy access whenever you want it.

title: Memorix Notes + Checklists
description:
Let Memorix take care of all your notes and checklists.
The clean design and superior usability make it real fun to jot down everything you don't want to forget.


Notes & Checklists
Jot down everything you don't want to forget, easily and comfortably. Add photos and images to your notes. To stay organized, use differently colored categories and order your notes alphabetically, by date of creation, last edit or reminder, or use drag & drop to arrange them to your personal liking.

Tasks, shopping lists or your fitness program - everything is organized perfectly with checklists.
Items can be rearranged via drag & drop at any time, checked items can be moved to the bottom of the list or be deleted all at once. For reoccuring tasks, you can also uncheck all items at once.

Reminders
Set reminders (also repeatable) to never forget important dates or shopping or pin notes to the status bar to have an eye on them all the time.

Categories
Order your notes into various categories which you can create, edit and delete at will.

Vault
Protect access to your most secret notes and pictures with a password.

Backup & Restore
You can create a backup of your notes and settings anytime or activate the daily automatic backup. The backups are stored on your device.

Widgets
Use the Memorix widgets to place notes directly on your homescreen and e.g. tick off items on your shopping list directly on the homescreen without starting Memorix.
Note: Android does not support widgets of apps moved to SD-card. Please see the FAQs on our website for details.

Search and filters
Fulltext search allows you to find specific notes instantly. Or only view the notes of a specific category, or only those having a reminder, ...

Safety net
Unintentional deletions can be undone. Deleted notes can also be restored from the trash (except notes from the vault which are - for safety reasons - deleted completely). And if everything fails, then there's still the backups.

Help & Feedback
Should you ever be stuck, check out our answers to frequently asked questions, or send us an email with your questions or suggestions.

title: ClevNote - Notepad, Checklist
description:
ClevNote is a memo app to help users to write memos necessary daily.
The list of memos supported by this app is as follows.

1. Manage bank account number
- If you enter the bank account number, you can copy it to the clipboard or send it to someone.

2. Manage checklist 
- You can write down necessary items and use these in a shopping list or to-do list.
- You can freely modify items for to-do lists, task lists or any kind of things-to-do lists.

3. Manage Birthdays list
- It reminds you about family or friends' birthdays. It supports calendar mode.

4. Manage site IDs
- Since there are countless internet sites out there, it is difficult to remember your IDs. This function helps you to remember them.

5. General text memo
- You can conveniently write down text memos.
- Even long memos will be okay.

[ Other functions ]
- Cloud backup and restore through Google Drive
- Reminder function
- Widget

[ Reasons to allow permission ]
‚Ä¢ WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE
: This permission is required to back up notes.
‚Ä¢ READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE
: This permission is required to restore the backup notes.

comments: A lovely app with no irritating ads. Caters for multiple entries per day, each with their own title & image, rather than trying to recap at the end of a day with one bulk entry. As something happens I wish to record, I quickly make an entry & title it. It makes finding & rereading much quicker & easier. Nice mood stickers & gentle feather reminder to journal. However, no notes book as advertised.

I absolutely love this app thank you so much the interface and everything is amazing i just have one issue and i hope you can fix that in you next update? I wish i could select the entries i wanna add to the a word file instead of all the entries at once that would really help me out a lot please do something about that i beg you i cannot find any other app as good as this one and i really don't wanna stop using it for such a simple issueüôÜ

First impression is what counts right? Theme isn't progressed by how many notes you write, giving anxiety about not writing enough like other journal apps I've seen. Basic simple themes for those not looking for flash, just needing to compose thoughts. Alerts available, lock available, pictures available free. As far as I'm concerned this app meets my requirements without extra payment
Over all great app, but I just wish that the font sizes can be adjusted and that the pictures could be viewed in full sizes
App looks simple enough but letdown by inability to select multiple photos to entry. This should be fixed as it's hard to add on other photos everytime.

title: Notepad
description:
Notepad - Notes
Adler Notes is free, full-featured and easy to use notepad app for Android.
You can use it as a digital notebook or diary. 
Our app is also perfect for recording lectures, business meetings and interviews.
It saves your inspirations, holiday plans, shopping lists or anything you want to organize or remember!
Colors and tags help you to organize and classify everything.
You can work everywhere, stay productive and get reminders at the right time.


More features and details
‚Ä¢ Basic note has a text field where you can write notes of any length
‚Ä¢ Notes can have many additional elements:
 - Bold title field
 - Colors such as on sticky notes, 8 colors to choose from (one of them can be set as default)
 - Task lists, to-do lists, shopping lists and checklists - checkboxes let you control what is to be done
 - You can take a photo and attach it to your note
 - Voice memos - high quality and low size M4A audio recordings
 - Speech to text - use voice recognizer to dictate a note
‚Ä¢ Reminders (one-time or recurring) notify you on time with blinking LED notification
‚Ä¢ Status bar - component (in the notifications area) helps you add a new note quickly
‚Ä¢ Tags support for better organize your notes
‚Ä¢ The most important notes can be added to Favorites
‚Ä¢ Efficient search helps you to get the information you need very quickly
‚Ä¢ Backup and restore features
‚Ä¢ Synchronization with Google Drive‚Ñ¢ and Dropbox‚Ñ¢ (auto sync works when needed and by default works on Wi-Fi only)
‚Ä¢ Very useful widgets - put your notes on your home screen:
 - Add Quick Note - provides quick access to the app
 - Single Note - sticky note memo, resizable widget displays one note
 - Your Notes - resizable widget displays all your notes or notes from selected list
‚Ä¢ Helpful actions on multiple notes at the same time (long-click selection support)
‚Ä¢ Sorting notes by modification date, creation date, reminder date and by name with favorites on top or not
‚Ä¢ Share ideas with friends and family via SMS, e-mail, Facebook, Twitter or any other app


About Us
‚Ä¢ Visit SplendApps.com: http://splendapps.com/
‚Ä¢ Our Privacy Policy: http://splendapps.com/privacy-policy

Follow Us

title: Post-it¬Æ
description:
The Post-it¬Æ App brings the simplicity of the Post-it¬Æ Note to your smartphone and tablet. Whether you use Post-it¬Æ Notes for collaboration or for personal note taking, the Post-it¬Æ App helps you keep that momentum going.

Simply capture analog notes with the camera, or create new notes right on your device for those important reminders. Arrange, refine and organize notes and ideas on your board anyway you see fit. Then share your organized board with friends and co-workers, or export to your favorite applications and cloud services‚Äîincluding Trello, PowerPoint, Excel, PDF, Dropbox and more.

The Post-it App features:

‚Ä¢ Capture more than 200 individual square Post-it¬Æ Notes at a time with your camera.
‚Ä¢ Get your notes transcribed using Handwriting Recognition. Great for search and exports.
‚Ä¢ Draw, erase, type and change the color of your notes using powerful editing tools.
‚Ä¢ Organize your way‚Äîgroup your ideas by thought or simply organize on a grid.
‚Ä¢ Combine boards‚Äîcollect and combine ideas from across multiple sessions.
‚Ä¢ Share to your favorites‚Äîsupports Trello, PowerPoint, Excel, PDF, Dropbox, and more.

Learn more about the Post-it App: post-it.com/app

Terms of Service: https://www.post-it.com/3M/en_US/post-it/ideas/app/eula/

recentChanges: Fixed a bug that affected the widget for some users. Notes are now updated and shown as expected.
comments: I really love this app! Being able to scan real-life post its in is a lifesaver, and the handwriting recognition is about 98% accurate even with my sloppy writing. I use it constantly, and so far it's the only app I've found that's really good for plotting and outlining writing projects. I do wish there was a way for me to drag around and reorganize entire boards within the main screen, but thays a minor annoyance on an otherwise stellar app.

The OG of Post-it Notes. The under appreciated invention that had all office workers to be reminded of their pending tasks, because of its striking yellow colour, surely not to be missed even on your most unproductive days. Now, its on your phone, add the widget to your home screen, boom!! Could not get any better. Hats off to the team on this great app.

I like the idea, but Google Keep is simply better. I like the idea of this app because it's colorful, you can pin notes as a widget, and it's fun. But I use Google keep to copy/ paste text from computer to computer. This app doesn't save over the internet, so my notes won't show up another phone or computer.

The handwriting recognition is a really useful tool. An useful upgrade to it could be a language recognizer so the user could select a language and the software could recognize the text on the post it and correct grammar errors when transforming it to digital text. In this way the recognition could have a broader efficiency margin

Had to reset my phone, reinstalled the app and my notes are gone. If there was some sort of sign in, this could be avoided. Need to be able to use different fonts in digital notes. Potential for a very good app.

title: Sec Notes- Free Secure Notepad
description:
Sec Note is a password protected free note taking application for android. It helps keep all your personal data secure and safe on your android phone. You can create simple notes, spreadsheets(Excel type) and checklists. It is the only app in play store offering multiple security options like password protection, pattern lock and pin lock.
Please visit http://www.sec-notes.com for support.
What makes Sec Notes the best -

- Security - Notes can't be read even if a thief is able to root your phone.
- Password, Pattern lock and Pin lock to choose from.
- Protect and Un-Protected notes individually.
- Home screen shortcuts for individual notes.
- Folders to organize notes.
- Automatic cloud backup options to Google Drive and Dropbox.
- All nots are stored encrypted using NSA and Military grade AES128 encryption algorithm.
- Three types of notes can be created - Notepads, Excel type spreadsheets and checklists.
- Undo/Redo buttons in notepad and spreadsheet.
- Formatting options available in all notes.
- Spreadsheet supports formulas.
- Import notes from files. Text notes as well as csv files are supported.
- Export notes to SD card as text, html or .xls(excel) files.
- Automatic locking after idle periods.
- Reminders.
- Text to speech.
- Random password generator.
- Share your notes.
- Backup/restore notes to SD card securely.
- Custom fonts.

comments: A good secure app for storing personal information. However, over recent months a problem has arisen with the line spacings when using 'Text' mode. Thw wrap around text feature goes to double spacing instead of single spacing which is very frustrating. I'm very surprised at this stage that the developer has not fixed this problem.
I have been using this app for a year. I just got a new phone and had to transfer data from google. Sec performed flawlessly, no lost notes or data. Great app!!

I'm happy with the free secure Sec Notes app. All my important info are secure. And also happy with the encryption feature to protect your passwords and personal details if your phone or idendity is ever stolen.

I have misplaced my password for Sec Notes. I can't find a way to reset it. I have emailed the support representative everyday for 5 days but no response. I have messaged Skipser on Facebook and through his blog. I have tried multiple times to join his forum for support, but reached only an error message. I have stored information in my sec note app that I would really like to use. Anyone have advice? I have not heard from Arun the developer, so I have uninstalled the Sec Notes App.
I enjoy the simplicity. I take a lot of notes and this is ideal. Would like to develop a better working relationship on using this app to its fullest. Exploring.

title: Notes with pictures - easy notepad with images
description:
A very lightweight, simple and easy to use free notepad to write down your notes and attach pictures, videos and documents

‚Ä¢ write as much as you want: you get unlimited characters!
‚Ä¢ add multiple pictures to your notes
‚Ä¢ add clickable links and emails to your notes and memos
‚Ä¢ write text in bold and italic
‚Ä¢ use tags, categories and folders to label and classify your notes
‚Ä¢ share your notes
‚Ä¢ manual backup of your notes
‚Ä¢ dark mode
‚Ä¢ show your notes in a folder view with a compact list or a comfy grid layout
‚Ä¢ highly customizable, with many options in the Settings
‚Ä¢ the notepad is simple and easy to use offline, and takes very little space on your phone

Notes doesn‚Äôt have ads and it doesn‚Äôt share your personal data. It contains optional one-time premium features to support the app development, that also let you:

‚Ä¢ add files, pictures, online photos, gifs, audio and videos above, below and in between your texts and stories by adding multiple sections
‚Ä¢ group your photos in several mosaic layout combinations
‚Ä¢ customize the font, size and color of the texts in your notes
‚Ä¢ set private notes protected by password
‚Ä¢ secure photos of sensitive documents (passport, driver license) with the private mode
‚Ä¢ search by text and highlight the search results
‚Ä¢ save and share your notes as an image, just the way they look in the app
‚Ä¢ make online backups
‚Ä¢ customize the app with 12 color themes, all including a night mode


Notes is available in English, Spanish, Portuguese, German, French, Italian, Russian and Indonesian, and you can help me with the translation to other languages

If at any point you find an error, something that doesn't work, that you think is missing or that you don't like, please use the Contact & Feedback section inside the app to let me know, and I will fix it!

Thank you for using my app!

Permissions: Notes needs Storage permissions to link images from your phone, and Internet permissions to link online images and do the online backup

DISCLAIMER:
‚Ä¢ Notes doesn‚Äôt keep copies of your photos, it only links to the photos on your phone. If you move or delete the photos from your device, the link stops working and the photo stops showing on the app. There is an option to link photos from the cloud. That way, you don't have to keep them on your device
‚Ä¢ Notes is an offline app. If you install it in multiple devices, your notes don‚Äôt sync automatically between them. You can still restore a backup from one device to another (as in changing phones), but this system is not useful for writing notes in multiple devices simultaneously

title: Notes - MemoCool Plus
description:
If you love decorating your fridge but also need to write down anything wherever you are ... don't worry! With MemoCool you can take the notes from your fridge in your pocket!


‚òÖ MAGNETIZE YOUR IDEAS ‚òÖ

Enjoy writing down any idea or reminder easily and give personality to your notes with over 80 magnets to choose from, different types of paper, typeface, colors ... even the style of your fridge!  Also you can stick photos or pictures from your image gallery.


Use the Widget to keep your sticky notes always visible on your home screen. Decorate and add a touch of color to your phone while remember your tasks.


‚òÖ CUSTOM MAGNETS ‚òÖ

Furthermore, with MemoCool you'll discover the artist in you, thanks to custom magnets with Pyssla or Hama beads. Unleash your creativity and make exclusive Pixel Art magnets for your notes! Write down your letter to Santa, or share your postcard for Christmas, Halloween or Valentine's Day in the most original way.


‚òÖ MEMOCOOL FEATURES ‚òÖ

‚óÜ Create sticky notes quickly and easily
‚óÜ Add photos directly from your image gallery.
‚óÜ Reminders with calendar and alarm
‚óÜ Enjoy the most realistic and fun HD visual experience
‚óÜ 87 great magnets to stick your notes. Many more icons to come!
‚óÜ 8 spaces for your Pixel Art custom drawings, with Pyssla and Hama beads design.
‚óÜ 19 types of paper (regular, notebook, parchment, animals) and 36 colors for your notes.
‚óÜ 12 different typographies (latin writing only), font size, custom colors and text alignment
‚óÜ 18 fridge styles (retro, cute, vinyl wrap, animal print, Christmas, kawaii...)
‚óÜ Up to two Widget sizes available to have your notes always visible
‚óÜ Share your notes through Whatsapp, Facebook, Twitter, etc.
‚óÜ Trash recovery function, so you don't lose any notes, so you can always keep your fridge door clean ;)
‚óÜ Free app. Release all features with Memocoins!

title: Notes (Notepad)
description:
‚òÖ Notes (Notepad) is a simple application which you must have!
It gives you a quick and simple notepad editing experience when you write notes, memos, e-mails, messages, shopping lists and to-do lists. You can also use Notes (Notepad) as a notebook, journal, agenda or diary.

‚òÖ Notes (Notepad) features two basic note taking formats, a text option, and a checklist option. Add as many as you want to your master list, which appears on the app's home screen each time the program opens.

‚òÖ Taking a Note ‚òÖ
Serving as a simple word processing program, the text option allows for as many characters as you're willing to type. Once saved, you can edit or delete the note. From main menu you can delete all notes.

‚òÖ Making To-do List or Shopping List ‚òÖ
In the checklist mode, you can add as many items as you'd like. After the list is finished and saved, you may check or uncheck each line on your list with a quick tap.

‚òÖ Features ‚òÖ
- Checklist
- Sorting notes
- Many stickers
- Many colors of backgrounds

designed by Freepik from Flaticon

title: Secure Notepad - Private Notes With Lock
description:
Secret notes must be saved in a locked and safe notepad. Your private diary must be protected with a password and hidden from everyone. And this private notepad is me! I help you keep all your important notes in a safe, secure place. I will do everything so that no one except you could open this secured notepad.

Private Notepad main features:
‚Ä¢ Simple and clean design
‚Ä¢ All secure notes are protected and accessible only to you
‚Ä¢ Encryption for every word
‚Ä¢ Automatic lock your private notepad
‚Ä¢ Restore password using the secret word
‚Ä¢ Draw notes
‚Ä¢ Create lists
‚Ä¢ Backup secure notes to SD card or Google Drive
‚Ä¢ Supports fingerprint sensor
‚Ä¢ Support for Emoji

Keep your private notes, passwords or contacts in the most secure place, away from strangers eyes.

Everyone has secrets to keep. Someone secretly writes poetry, another is engaged in writing love stories, and the third is writing a private diary. With this private notepad app all your data will be safe and locked!

A protected notepad will create a personal island in a family tablet, a unique encoded place what even intruders cannot crack. It's like a full-fledged vault in your smartphone, and only you have password from it. Vault does not leave any data on the internal storage of the smartphone, which means it is very difficult to hack.

The private notepad is not the only password protected, but also encrypts every word you enter so that no one can recognize the secrets stored in it. The AES algorithm encodes each character, making it unreadable outside the program.

A secure notepad allows you to save a protected backup copy of notes on internal storage or Google Drive, before exporting, all data is encrypted, what not only protect notes but also made backup absolutely safe.

You can unlock private notepad using password or fingerprint sensor. Choose your way to do it! Forgot password? Read hint to restore access to notes! Even if it does not help, I will always be happy to answer your request and help in solving the problem.

Simple and fast private notepad free app with all necessary functions and features. Just try it!

Notepad with lock will help you to hide all important notes and data in one secured place. No need to worry about from now, all is totally protected and encrypted.

If you have any suggestions for improving Secure Notepad app, leave them in the feedback or use the contact form

title: Natural Notes
description:
Natural Notes is a free digital note book for Android smartphones or tablets.
With Natural Notes you can write, store and share your notes.
It is a useful application, natural to use and totally free!
You can add, edit, delete and share the notes you add.
In addition to using this application as a digital note pad, you can use it to compose and save messages that you can then send by email, SMS and with other applications installed on your device. Just write a note and use the "share" feature.
You can even write your tweets to Twitter or Facebook messages ... write down everything you need, Natural Notes stores it for when you want to check your notes or send them.
Includes backup feature to the MicroSD memory card of your device.
Nature Notes is a free application and without ads. Does not connect to the Internet.
Added option to open any .txt file on the device with Natural Notes and save it as a note (.txt files you receive via Bluetooth, as an email attach, etc).

Added option to install or move the app to the SD card (on Android versions that allow this)
New design for large 10 inch HoneyComb tablets

Improved portuguese translation. Thank you Bernardo!
Improved french translation. Thank you Philippe!
Improved style for large non-Honeycomb tablets. 
Improved translation into Italian and Portuguese.

Version 2.9
NEW If there is no title for the note it will set automatically.
NEW Improved design on Android Ice Cream and Jelly Bean versions.
NEW Added more options to the new Settings screen.
NEW Double tap note text to open edit mode.
NEW Added option to insert date and time to text or title name on double tap.
NEW More control over your backups: you can now choose the folder on your device in the settings screen.
NEW Various bug fixes.

Your comments and suggestions are welcome at info@naturalapps.com email (we can not reply to comments).

title: Voice Notes
description:
Features:

- Only one touch needed. 
  It can keep receiving your speech and convert to text. Note down and remind you later at the date/time you set.

-It's easy for you to take notes, memo, to-do list etc. just by speaking!

- Integrated with your Android calendars, you need not maintain another one.

- Also easy to share voice-to-text to friends.

- Automatically save your notes in a storage file, and easily back up to cloud.

- Support to create notes by projects or categories.

- It can work when the phone screen is turned off.
  With the Recite option, you can make sure the notes are correctly recorded.

- Support headset button to control Start/Stop voice recognition.

- Supported speech recognition 120 languages.

- Supported 20 user interface languages (including English)

- Simple user interface. Just press the microphone button and speak to take note!

Requirements:
- Google voice search (Google App) with v6.15.24.21 or higher is required as  a speech to text engine. Most devices have it pre-installed. If your devices do not install it, This app will  guide you to install.
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.google.android.googlequicksearchbox


Permissions Notice:
This app may ask for permission to access the following features
‚Ä¢ Microphone for speech recognition
‚Ä¢ External storage for saving notes file
‚Ä¢ Calendar for adding reminder event
